translation.en: DOCUMENTARY FILMMAKER: Antarctica. An inhospitable wasteland.
translation.zh: 南极洲 一个荒凉的不毛之地

translation.en: But even here, on the Earth's frozen bottom,
translation.zh: 但即使在这里 地球这一端的冰天雪地里

translation.en: we find life.
translation.zh: 也有生命存在

translation.en: And not just any life.
translation.zh: 而且不是普通的生物

translation.en: Penguins.
translation.zh: 是企鹅

translation.en: (penguins laughing) Joyous, frolicking, waddling,
translation.zh: 快乐的 顽皮的

translation.en: cute and cuddly life.
translation.zh: 摇摇晃晃 呆萌可爱的小东西

translation.en: (chuckles) Look at them tumbling onto their chubby bum-bums.
translation.zh: 看看它们 扭着胖胖的身子 前滚后翻着

translation.en: Who could take these frisky little snow clowns...
translation.zh: 怎么可能对这些 滑稽可爱的小东西们…

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 严肃点儿

translation.en: Does anyone even know where we're marching to?
translation.zh: 有谁知道我们这是在往哪儿走吗？

translation.en: Who cares? I question nothing.
translation.zh: -管它呢 -我是无所谓

translation.en: Me, too. Me, too. Well, fine!
translation.zh: -管它呢 -我是无所谓 -我也是 -我也是

translation.en: We'll just fly to the front of the line and see for ourselves.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们就飞到 队伍前面去看一看

translation.en: Kowalski! Rico! Engage aerial surveillance.
translation.zh: 科斯基、瑞哥 准备执行空中侦察任务

translation.en: Here we go! Doing it! Come on!
translation.zh: 好吧 使劲儿 飞啊

translation.en: Skipper, we appear to be flightless.
translation.zh: 好吧 使劲儿 飞啊 老大 貌似我们不会飞啊

translation.en: Aw, well, what's the point of these?
translation.zh: 老大 貌似我们不会飞啊 那这是干什么用的？

translation.en: Whoa! I like it! Hey, this could be our thing!
translation.zh: 这个动作帅 可以当做招牌动作

translation.en: What are we gonna call it? Let's call it the, uh... "high one."
translation.zh: 叫什么名字呢？ 我们就叫它“来一下”

translation.en: (gasping) Hey! Anybody see that? That's an egg!
translation.zh: 你们看到了吗？一个蛋

translation.en: Is someone gonna go get it?
translation.zh: 谁去把它捡回来？

translation.en: W-We can't do that.
translation.zh: -我们不能那么做 -为什么？

translation.en: Why not? Well, it's a dangerous world
translation.zh: -我们不能那么做 -为什么？ 外面的世界很危险

translation.en: out there, and we're just penguins.
translation.zh: 外面的世界很危险 我们只是企鹅而已

translation.en: You know, nothing but cute and cuddly.
translation.zh: -除了卖萌 我们什么都不会 -是啊

translation.en: Yeah. Why do you think there are
translation.zh: -除了卖萌 我们什么都不会 -是啊 不然为什么 总有纪录片剧组在拍我们？

translation.en: always documentary crews filming us?
translation.zh: 不然为什么 总有纪录片剧组在拍我们？

translation.en: Well, sorry, kid. You know, we lose a few eggs every year.
translation.zh: 抱歉 孩子 我们每年总会丢几个蛋的

translation.en: It's just nature.
translation.zh: 自然规律

translation.en: Oh, right, nature. I guess that makes sense, but...
translation.zh: 是自然规律 这倒也说得通

translation.en: something... something deep down in my gut tells me
translation.zh: 不过 总觉得在我内心深处

translation.en: that it-it makes no sense at all.
translation.zh: 有个声音在告诉我 这事儿不大对劲儿

translation.en: You know what? I reject nature!
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？我拒绝自然规律

translation.en: Who's with me?!
translation.zh: 谁跟我一起去？

translation.en: The old ship. No one's ever returned from there alive.
translation.zh: 那艘旧船 去过的从没有谁活着回来过

translation.en: SKIPPER: Relax, Kowalski. There's a bird down there now.
translation.zh: 放心 科斯基 那只鸟不就落那儿了吗？

translation.en: Look, he's fine. (others gasp)
translation.zh: 看 没什么事

translation.en: Leopard seals-- nature's snakes.
translation.zh: 豹型海豹 自然之蛇

translation.en: Aren't snakes nature's snakes?
translation.zh: 难道蛇不属于自然界吗？

translation.en: How should I know? I live on the flipping frozen tundra.
translation.zh: 我怎么知道？ 我就没离开过这该死的冰原

translation.en: SKIPPER: They're going for the egg!
translation.zh: 他们要吃那个蛋了！

translation.en: Give me a way down there, ASAP!
translation.zh: 快想办法下去 马上

translation.en: All one would have to do is collect 300 feet of kelp,
translation.zh: 我们唯一能做的就是 找一条90米长的海带 然后…

translation.en: dry it in the... Tiny and helpless,
translation.zh: 弱小而又无助

translation.en: the baby penguins are frozen with fear.
translation.zh: 企鹅宝宝们现在是又冷又怕

translation.en: They know if they fall from this cliff, they will surely die.
translation.zh: 它们知道 如果掉下去必死无疑

translation.en: Gunter, give them a shove.
translation.zh: 冈特 给它们一点儿动力

translation.en: KOWALSKI: ...harnessing the jellyfish we've trained to obey simple voice commands.
translation.zh: 用我们训练水母服从简单口令的方法

translation.en: Now, that's more like it!
translation.zh: 这样还差不多

translation.en: That-a-boy, Rico! SKIPPER: Don't let him have it!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 瑞哥 别让他们得逞

translation.en: Okay. I guess that works. (seal growls)
translation.zh: 好了 这下他们没辙了

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Get to high ground!
translation.zh: 快往高处跑

translation.en: SKIPPER: Boo-yah! KOWALSKI: Ha-ha! Success! Oh.
translation.zh: 成功了

translation.en: KOWALSKI: I'd recommend firing it now. Nope, hold on.
translation.zh: 我建议马上开火 不 等一下

translation.en: Uh, we really should fire it. Not till we see
translation.zh: 还是快开火吧 等看到他的眼白再开火

translation.en: the white of its eyes.
translation.zh: 等看到他的眼白再开火

translation.en: They're mostly pupil. Very little white. Almost none!
translation.zh: 哪儿有眼白啊 就那么一点点 跟没有一样

translation.en: They got to have a little bit of white, right?
translation.zh: -就算一点点那也是眼白 对吗？ -根本算不上

translation.en: None whatsoever. What if they look really far to the left?
translation.zh: -就算一点点那也是眼白 对吗？ -根本算不上 如果他们使劲往左看呢？

translation.en: SKIPPER: Fire in the hole!
translation.zh: 准备发射

translation.en: Kowalski, analysis?
translation.zh: 科斯基 分析一下战况

translation.en: We are really awesome at this.
translation.zh: 我们干得太漂亮了

translation.en: Boys, we did it! Mission accomplished!
translation.zh: 各位 我们成功了 任务已经完成了

translation.en: Hey, hey, we can do our thing. High one!
translation.zh: 我们的招牌动作呢？来一下

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Ooh. My bad. (gasps) Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 都怪我

translation.en: Look. It's... it's the miracle of birth.
translation.zh: 看啊 这是生命繁衍的奇迹

translation.en: A moment... of extraordinary beauty.
translation.zh: 这一刻 真是美妙至极

translation.en: Oh, that's disgusting! I think I have amniotic sac in my mouth!
translation.zh: 恶心死了 粘液都迸到我嘴里了

translation.en: Hello. Are you my family?
translation.zh: 你们好 你们是我的家人吗？

translation.en: You don't have a family, and we're all going to die. Sorry.
translation.zh: 你根本没有家人 我们都要死了

translation.en: Wh-What?
translation.zh: -抱歉 -什么？

translation.en: What? I-I thought that was what we were all nodding about.
translation.zh: 干什么？ 这不是刚才咱们商量好的吗？

translation.en: No one's gonna die! Know what you've got, kid?
translation.zh: 没有人会死的 别伤心 孩子

translation.en: You've got us. We've got each other.
translation.zh: 还有我们呢 我们拥有彼此

translation.en: And if that ain't a family, I don't know what is.
translation.zh: 这不是家人 还能是什么呢？

translation.en: So adorable. Kowalski, what's our trajectory?
translation.zh: 你真可爱 科斯基 目前是什么情况？

translation.en: 95% certain we're still doomed.
translation.zh: 95%的可能性是我们会完蛋

translation.en: And the, uh, other five percent?
translation.zh: 那么另外5%呢？

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Adventure and glory like no penguins have ever seen before.
translation.zh: 是其他企鹅从未经历过的冒险和荣耀

translation.en: I'll take that action.
translation.zh: 那我就选这条路了

translation.en: But where are we going?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪儿？

translation.en: SKIPPER: The future, boys. Glorious future!
translation.zh: 未来 伙计们 辉煌的未来

translation.en: SKIPPER: Ah, that song!
translation.zh: （辉煌的未来） 又是这首歌？ 我都快把三文鱼大餐给吐出来了

translation.en: I swear it's gonna make me lose my salmon.
translation.zh: 又是这首歌？ 我都快把三文鱼大餐给吐出来了 （萨拉戈萨马戏团）

translation.en: Singing getting louder, Skipper!
translation.zh: 歌声越来越大了 老大

translation.en: Then move faster!
translation.zh: 那就快行动

translation.en: Somebody get that wig off Private.
translation.zh: 谁去把菜鸟戴的假发摘下来

translation.en: Kowalski, status report!
translation.zh: 科斯基 目前是什么情况？

translation.en: I'm really getting tired of this song.
translation.zh: 我实在是受够这首歌了

translation.en: SKIPPER: Well, the best part of owning a circus
translation.zh: 拥有马戏团最大的好处

translation.en: is you can transport a cannon over state lines.
translation.zh: 拥有马戏团最大的好处 就是可以在各州来回运送大炮

translation.en: Ten years ago on this very day,
translation.zh: 十年前的今天

translation.en: a tiny egg hatched, and our world
translation.zh: 一个小小的蛋孵化了 这世界多了个可爱的生命

translation.en: got a little bit cuter. (giggles)
translation.zh: 这世界多了个可爱的生命

translation.en: So tonight, Private,
translation.zh: 所以今天晚上 菜鸟

translation.en: we celebrate your birthday
translation.zh: 我们为你庆祝生日的方式

translation.en: by infiltrating the United States gold depository
translation.zh: 就是带你潜入在诺克斯堡的 美国黄金储备处

translation.en: at Fort Knox! Splendid!
translation.zh: 美国黄金储备处 -太棒了 -什么？

translation.en: What? There she is, boys.
translation.zh: 前面就到了 兄弟们

translation.en: The object of our unholy desire.
translation.zh: 那就是我们邪恶欲望的目标

translation.en: The butter on our biscuit. The royal flush.
translation.zh: 就像面包上的黄油 无比诱惑

translation.en: PRIVATE: Skipper? Private,
translation.zh: -老大 -长官讲话的时候不能随便插嘴

translation.en: what's our rule about interrupting analogies?
translation.zh: -老大 -长官讲话的时候不能随便插嘴 -这是规矩 -抱歉 请长官继续

translation.en: Sorry. Please continue.
translation.zh: -这是规矩 -抱歉 请长官继续

translation.en: The moment's gone. Private ruined it.
translation.zh: 没感觉了 都怪你打岔

translation.en: Sir, we're approaching our target.
translation.zh: 长官 我们在接近目标

translation.en: But, Skipper, I really...
translation.zh: 可是 老大 我真不…

translation.en: Are you questioning my leadership, Private?
translation.zh: 你在质疑我的领导能力吗 菜鸟？

translation.en: No, sir. Too bad.
translation.zh: -不 长官 -真遗憾

translation.en: 'Cause I respect a soldier with some moxie.
translation.zh: 因为我只欣赏有勇气的士兵

translation.en: Really? Then I really think we should...
translation.zh: 是吗？那我真觉得我们该…

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Dial back the moxie, sass-mouth.
translation.zh: 现在就别来什么勇气了 乌鸦嘴

translation.en: (chuckles): Oh, look at you. Still so adorable.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你 你是可爱的小宝宝

translation.en: SKIPPER: Fire in the hole!
translation.zh: 准备开火

translation.en: FEMALE VOICE: 8:00. Night-night time. Wha...? (men gasping)
translation.zh: -8点整 该睡觉觉了 -什么？

translation.en: Private, come on!
translation.zh: 快 菜鸟 快走

translation.en: AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Please enter pass code.
translation.zh: 请输入密码

translation.en: Kowalski, you're up.
translation.zh: 科斯基 你上

translation.en: AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Please enter pass code.
translation.zh: 请输入密码 （输入密码）

translation.en: Rico, sonic incursion device.
translation.zh: 瑞哥 声波入侵设备

translation.en: Oh, come on, you're kidding right?
translation.zh: 我说你是在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Kentucky, Skipper.
translation.zh: 这里可是肯塔基

translation.en: They do love their Flatt and Scruggs.
translation.zh: 他们非常喜欢乡村音乐

translation.en: AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Y'all come in now, y'hear?
translation.zh: 都进来吧 喝杯冰茶

translation.en: Have yourself a iced tea.
translation.zh: （通过验证）

translation.en: Private, if you could have anything you wanted
translation.zh: 菜鸟 如果让你随便在这个世界中 挑一样东西

translation.en: in the whole wide world,
translation.zh: 如果让你随便在这个世界中 挑一样东西

translation.en: what would it be? Well, gee, Skipper,
translation.zh: 你会挑什么？ 如果这样 老大

translation.en: I think to be a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.zh: 我希望能成为我们队伍中的重要角色

translation.en: Ah. Well, we got you something else.
translation.zh: 好吧 有点儿出乎意料

translation.en: A vending machine? Well, not just
translation.zh: 自动售货机

translation.en: any vending machine, Private.
translation.zh: 不是普通的自动售货机 菜鸟

translation.en: The last remaining home in America's nanny state
translation.zh: 是专门出售 美国这个保姆式国家中仅存的

translation.en: for those succulent but chemically hazardous
translation.zh: 美国这个保姆式国家中仅存的 好吃却非常不健康的膨化美食

translation.en: bits of puffed heaven called...
translation.zh: 好吃却非常不健康的膨化美食 我们叫它…

translation.en: PRIVATE: (gasps) Cheezy Dibbles!
translation.zh: （芝士条 酥脆可口） 芝士条

translation.en: Happy ding-dong birthday, you little scamp!
translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐 你这个小傻瓜

translation.en: Oh-ho-ho! Oh-ho, thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You mess with the bull, you're gonna get the horns, Private.
translation.zh: 亲手摘下的果实最甜 菜鸟 快去投币 自己取礼物

translation.en: Now, hit that machine and get your present.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 快去投币 自己取礼物

translation.en: We just broke into the most secure facility in North America.
translation.zh: 我们闯入了北美保安最严的机构

translation.en: You know what that means? We're wanted criminals
translation.zh: 知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: who'll be on the lam the rest of our lives,
translation.zh: 我们会成为通缉犯 在逃亡中度过余生

translation.en: always feeling the hot breath of Johnny Law on our necks?
translation.zh: 时刻都要担心被抓捕归案吗？

translation.en: SKIPPER: No! It means, as elite units go,
translation.zh: 不 这意味着 跟所谓的精英相比

translation.en: we're the elitest of the elite.
translation.zh: 我们是精英中的精英

translation.en: (Private gasping) Top shelf in the bureau. The penultimate, plus one.
translation.zh: 是最厉害的精英 世界第一 没有第二

translation.en: Where'd Private go?
translation.zh: 菜鸟哪儿去了？

translation.en: Oh, there he is. D-3.
translation.zh: 他在里边 D3

translation.en: Oh, Private. How much is he?
translation.zh: 这家伙 标价是多少？

translation.en: He's $3.50, sir.
translation.zh: 3美元5美分 长官

translation.en: Well, that's outrageous. Even for Private.
translation.zh: 这也太离谱了 怎么会这么贵？

translation.en: Sir, the machine is alive!
translation.zh: 长官 售货机活了

translation.en: I don't think I like your attitude, vending machine.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢你这种态度 自动售货机 还有那破价格

translation.en: Or your prices!
translation.zh: 自动售货机 还有那破价格

translation.en: Release them!
translation.zh: 快放了他们

translation.en: What the...?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: Kowalski, analysis.
translation.zh: 科斯基 分析战况

translation.en: All evidence indicates...
translation.zh: 所有的证据都显示出…

translation.en: I ate too many Cheezy Dibbles.
translation.zh: 我是芝士条吃太多了

translation.en: We're behind enemy lines and incredibly thirsty.
translation.zh: 我们现在身处敌人后方 口渴难耐

translation.en: Rico, bust us out of this delicious prison.
translation.zh: 瑞哥 把我们 从这个甜蜜牢笼里弄出去

translation.en: Nice work, Rico. Ha-ha!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 瑞哥

translation.en: You are a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.zh: 真是我们队伍中不可缺少的重要角色

translation.en: SKIPPER: Private, quit lollygagging. And regular gagging.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 轻点儿咳 最好别出声

translation.en: Dark and ominous--
translation.zh: 黑暗 不吉利

translation.en: two of my least favorite traits in a room.
translation.zh: 我最讨厌的两点 这屋子全占了

translation.en: Oh, look! A button.
translation.zh: 看 有个按钮

translation.en: Huh? Private, don't!
translation.zh: 菜鸟 别按

translation.en: Now, what have I told you about... Sorry, what?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过什么来着？ （危险） 说什么？

translation.en: It looks like some sort of giant laser
translation.zh: 看来是想用这个 大型激光发射器干掉我们 长官

translation.en: sent to kill us all, sir.
translation.zh: 大型激光发射器干掉我们 长官

translation.en: PRIVATE: Ooh! Another one. ALL: No!
translation.zh: -这儿还有一个 -别动！

translation.en: Huh? Wha...? (singsongy): Naughty, naughty.
translation.zh: -什么？什么东西？ -真是淘气

translation.en: Pretty birds belong in their cages.
translation.zh: 可爱的鸟儿应该呆在笼子里的

translation.en: Now, that's just hurtful.
translation.zh: 这表情真伤人自尊

translation.en: And I was so happy to see you again.
translation.zh: 亏我还那么高兴再见到你们呢

translation.en: Skipper... Kowalski... Rico...
translation.zh: 老大 科斯基 瑞哥

translation.en: and sweet little Private.
translation.zh: 还有这个小菜鸟

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: The humans know me as Dr. Octavius Brine.
translation.zh: 对人类来说 我是奥克塔维布莱恩博士 （《天才生活》 奥克塔维布莱恩博士）

translation.en: Renowned geneticist, cheese enthusiast,
translation.zh: 著名的遗传学家 芝士的爱好者

translation.en: and frequent donor to NPR pledge drives.
translation.zh: 也是公共电台慈善项目的长期贡献者

translation.en: But you know me by a different, much older name.
translation.zh: 对你们来说 我还有一个更古老的名字

translation.en: A name perhaps you'd hoped you'd never hear again.
translation.zh: 恐怕你们这辈子 都希望不再听到这个名字

translation.en: A phantom! A shadow of a former life!
translation.zh: 前世的一个幽灵 一个阴影

translation.en: I... am... Dave!
translation.zh: 我就是戴夫

translation.en: Kowalski? Sorry, sir, no clue.
translation.zh: -科斯基 -抱歉 长官 不知道

translation.en: Dave...!
translation.zh: 戴夫

translation.en: Dave! Dave...!
translation.zh: -戴夫 -戴夫

translation.en: Dave? Dave...!
translation.zh: -戴夫 -戴夫

translation.en: Dave. Dave!
translation.zh: -戴夫 -戴夫

translation.en: Sorry. Wait. Wait. Uh... I... I live this way.
translation.zh: 抱歉 等等 我家在这边

translation.en: Go ahead, Dan, continue.
translation.zh: 继续 丹恩 接着说

translation.en: You seriously don't remember me?
translation.zh: 难道你们真的不记得我了？

translation.en: Dave! Dave! Right! Oh, yeah, long time. Uh... how's the wife?
translation.zh: 戴夫 对 好久没见面了 夫人好吗？

translation.en: I've never been married.
translation.zh: 我就没结过婚 你们可能不记得我了

translation.en: You may not remember me, but I could never forget you.
translation.zh: 我就没结过婚 你们可能不记得我了 但我绝不会忘记你们

translation.en: Let's shake up some old memories.
translation.zh: 让我们一起来回忆一下

translation.en: New York City.
translation.zh: 在纽约

translation.en: The Central Park Zoo.
translation.zh: 中央公园动物园 （中央公园动物园）

translation.en: Life was good. (children laughing)
translation.zh: 美好的生活 宽敞的水族箱

translation.en: Roomy tank, great location,
translation.zh: 美好的生活 宽敞的水族箱 （章鱼） 超棒的地段 猴山景观房

translation.en: monkey-house views.
translation.zh: 超棒的地段 猴山景观房

translation.en: And, of course... (children gasp)
translation.zh: 当然还有

translation.en: my adoring legion of fans.
translation.zh: -众多崇拜我的粉丝 -酷啊

translation.en: Cool. Dave!
translation.zh: -众多崇拜我的粉丝 -酷啊 戴夫 会玩儿上千种花样的章鱼哥

translation.en: The octopus of a thousand tricks.
translation.zh: 戴夫 会玩儿上千种花样的章鱼哥

translation.en: Awesome!
translation.zh: 真厉害

translation.en: I was the total package.
translation.zh: 当时真是春风得意啊

translation.en: GIRL: Wow. MAN: Hey, kids! You got to see this. Get up here quick!
translation.zh: 孩子们 快来看这个 快来 快点儿

translation.en: And then you arrived.
translation.zh: 然后 你们来了

translation.en: WOMAN: Oh, they're so adorable! (crowd cheering)
translation.zh: 天啊 它们真可爱！

translation.en: Just, uh, smile and wave, boys. Smile and wave.
translation.zh: 就这样 挥手微笑 兄弟们 挥手微笑

translation.en: And took everything from me. GIRL: They're so cute!
translation.zh: 是你们让我一无所有的

translation.en: They are so adorable. WOMAN: Have you ever seen anything cuter?
translation.zh: -好可爱 -你见过这么可爱的小东西吗？

translation.en: Four adorable baby penguins.
translation.zh: 四只可爱的企鹅宝宝

translation.en: With you around, no one wanted an old octopus anymore.
translation.zh: 有你们在 从此就没有人再在乎老章鱼了

translation.en: "Out you go, Dave." (engine starts)
translation.zh: （送往：圣迭戈） 你该走了 戴夫

translation.en: And so it went, over and over,
translation.zh: （圣迭戈海洋公园） 然后我的噩梦就开始了

translation.en: at zoo after aquarium. Dad, look!
translation.zh: 从动物园到水族馆

translation.en: I can't see the penguins, man!
translation.zh: 我看不到企鹅了 老兄

translation.en: Adorable penguins stole the show. MAN: Whoo! Yeah!
translation.zh: 可爱的企鹅让我丢了饭碗

translation.en: While I was shunned.
translation.zh: （戴夫） 我被抛弃

translation.en: Forgotten.
translation.zh: （巴西动物园） 被遗忘

translation.en: Unwanted.
translation.zh: 受尽冷落

translation.en: Alone.
translation.zh: 孤独

translation.en: That sounds awful. Oh, it was.
translation.zh: -听起来好惨啊 -的确如此

translation.en: I came to realize
translation.zh: 我这才开始明白

translation.en: some creatures are born to get all the love.
translation.zh: 有些生物生来就是被人爱的

translation.en: The rest of us get nothing!
translation.zh: 别人什么都得不到

translation.en: The only thing that has kept me going all these years is my
translation.zh: 这些年来 让我撑下来的唯一精神支柱 就是这燃烧的、复仇的火焰

translation.en: burning thirst for revenge!
translation.zh: 就是这燃烧的、复仇的火焰

translation.en: And my precious souvenir snow globe collection.
translation.zh: 还有我宝贵的纪念品雪花玻璃球

translation.en: What is wrong with you?!
translation.zh: 你是不是脑袋进水了？

translation.en: (grunts "I don't know," swallows)
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Oh, Daryl, Daryl, Daryl, you can't blame us for what happened to you.
translation.zh: 戴瑞 这种事也不能怪我们

translation.en: Uh, can. That's how this whole revenge thing works.
translation.zh: 能 复仇的事情就是这样的

translation.en: And with this, I finally have the power to destroy you.
translation.zh: 有了这个 我就拥有了 毁掉你们的力量

translation.en: Crikey!
translation.zh: 怕怕

translation.en: Nicolas, cage them.
translation.zh: 尼古拉斯 抓住他们

translation.en: I've got some bad news for you, Dennis.
translation.zh: 有个坏消息告诉你 丹尼斯

translation.en: You messed with the wrong birds.
translation.zh: 你惹错鸟了

translation.en: Because we are an elite unit, the best of the best.
translation.zh: 我们可是精英小分队 精英中的精英

translation.en: Cream of the corn on a platinum cob.
translation.zh: 身怀绝技 让你不堪一击

translation.en: And we're gonna take your deadly green goop
translation.zh: 我们会带着你那瓶致命的绿色液体

translation.en: and sashay right out the exit hatch.
translation.zh: 从容不迫地离开这里

translation.en: And just how are you going to do that?
translation.zh: 可是你怎么才能做到这一点呢？

translation.en: Deploy secret weapon.
translation.zh: 部署秘密武器

translation.en: Aah! The cheese, it burns! (octopi burbling)
translation.zh: 天哪 我的眼睛

translation.en: Roll out.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: After them!
translation.zh: 追上他们

translation.en: All right, boys, it's just like Cuba.
translation.zh: 好吧 各位 跟古巴那次一样

translation.en: Taxi!
translation.zh: 出租车

translation.en: How about some music? Something chase-y.
translation.zh: 来点音乐 要劲爆点儿的

translation.en: Here they come.
translation.zh: 他们来了

translation.en: Let's move. PRIVATE: Stroke! Stroke! Stroke again!
translation.zh: 加把劲儿 划啊 使劲划

translation.en: Stroke some more! Stroke! Stroke! Stroke!
translation.zh: 再使点劲儿 划啊

translation.en: Stroke! Sorry! (speaking angrily in Italian) Stroke! Stroke!
translation.zh: -天哪 你们没长眼睛吗？ -对不起 划呀

translation.en: (man shouting in Italian)
translation.zh: -天哪 你们没长眼睛吗？ -对不起 划呀 有你们这样划船的吗？

translation.en: (speaking frantically in Italian)
translation.zh: 我在说你们呢 怎么连道歉… 什么？干什么？我…

translation.en: (muffled yelling) (octopus burbling)
translation.zh: 什么？干什么？我…

translation.en: We got baddies, six o'clock.
translation.zh: 发现他们了 6点钟方向

translation.en: SKIPPER: Kowalski, battle formation.
translation.zh: 科斯基 摆战斗阵型

translation.en: Ha! So you squeegees want to do the gondola mambo? (octopus burbling) Let's dance.
translation.zh: 你们这帮马桶抽子想打架吗？ 那就来吧

translation.en: Ow! Mother-of-pearl, that stings! I've lost visual.
translation.zh: 我的妈呀 什么东西？我看不见了

translation.en: (octopus burbles) Kowalski, be my eyes.
translation.zh: 科斯基 你来指挥

translation.en: Uh, left. (grunts) KOWALSKI: Right, right! Up! Duck.
translation.zh: 向左 右边 向上 低头

translation.en: (octopus burbling) (man speaking Italian)
translation.zh: 搞什么呢？

translation.en: SKIPPER: I think I got 'em. They are down, sir.
translation.zh: -好像是打中了 -他们完蛋了 长官

translation.en: Excelente.
translation.zh: 太精彩了

translation.en: Skipper! KOWALSKI: They're back up.
translation.zh: 老大 他们追上来了 前面好像没有路了

translation.en: And we are running out of canal.
translation.zh: 他们追上来了 前面好像没有路了

translation.en: Parker Posey! Go all-terrain.
translation.zh: 我的神啊 全地形状态

translation.en: We've lost engine one!
translation.zh: 一号引擎熄火！

translation.en: (grunts) And two and three. Four! (woman screams)
translation.zh: 二号、三号也熄火了 还有四号！

translation.en: (laughs) Switch to emergency power.
translation.zh: 启动备用引擎

translation.en: Aye, aye, Skipper.
translation.zh: 遵命 老大

translation.en: PRIVATE: We've got melons! Dead ahead!
translation.zh: 有一车西瓜 没有路了

translation.en: I can see. Rico, the glowy thing! (grunts)
translation.zh: 能看见了 瑞哥 是那个东西

translation.en: Aah! Venetian blinded again!
translation.zh: 我又看不见了！

translation.en: KOWALSKI: We've been boarded.
translation.zh: 他们已经上船了

translation.en: SKIPPER: Initiate self-destruct sequence. (man grunts, screams) (whooping)
translation.zh: 启动自毁程序

translation.en: Nice. Whee! (people scream)
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: Frankly, I'm surprised we had a self-destruct sequence.
translation.zh: 说实话 我挺惊讶咱们还有自毁程序

translation.en: (groaning, sighing) SKIPPER: All right, boys, battle stance.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 战斗姿态

translation.en: We're in battle stance, sir.
translation.zh: 战斗姿态就绪 老大

translation.en: Oh. Okay, good. Now we, uh, spring our trap.
translation.zh: 好的 很好 现在我们来瓮中捉鳖

translation.en: KOWALSKI: I'm not sure they're the ones that are trapped, sir.
translation.zh: 还说不定谁是鳖呢 长官

translation.en: Kowalski, remember our little talk
translation.zh: 科斯基 还记得我跟你说过的那些

translation.en: about true but unhelpful comments?
translation.zh: 科斯基 还记得我跟你说过的那些 -真实但毫无用处的话吗？ -是的 长官

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -真实但毫无用处的话吗？ -是的 长官

translation.en: Sometimes we just have to wing it.
translation.zh: 有时侯是要临场发挥的

translation.en: (frantic burbling) (phone ringing)
translation.zh: （电话亭）

translation.en: Sorry for underestimating the plan, Skipper.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我低估了你的计划 老大

translation.en: It's okay, Kowalski.
translation.zh: 没关系 科斯基

translation.en: Just don't ever doubt me again.
translation.zh: 以后不要再怀疑我就是了

translation.en: Now, what the heck is going on?!
translation.zh: 这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: Remain calm, penguins.
translation.zh: 冷静点儿 企鹅们

translation.en: You are now under the protection of the North Wind.
translation.zh: 你们现在在北风特工局的保护之下 （北风特工局）

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Aw, you guys are so cute.
translation.zh: 天哪 你们真是太可爱了

translation.en: (penguins protesting, groaning) You guys are just so, so cute! Ooh... and cuddly.
translation.zh: 而且这么萌 太可爱了

translation.en: Hey, get away! No more hugs!
translation.zh: 放开我 别抱着了

translation.en: It's like being licked by a basket full of puppy dogs.
translation.zh: 就好像被一整篮子小奶狗舔个不停

translation.en: Corporal! Hmm?
translation.zh: 就好像被一整篮子小奶狗舔个不停 大熊

translation.en: Corporal!
translation.zh: 大熊

translation.en: Chart a course back to North Wind headquarters.
translation.zh: 设置导航回北风特工局总部

translation.en: Eva, inform them that we're bringing in witnesses.
translation.zh: 伊娃 告诉他们 我们带证人过去了

translation.en: Private, Dibble me.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 芝士条

translation.en: We're not going anywhere with you.
translation.zh: 我们是绝对不会跟你们走的

translation.en: We don't even know who the heck you are.
translation.zh: 你们到底是什么人？

translation.en: The North Wind is an elite undercover interspe... (crunching loudly)
translation.zh: 北风特工局是一个秘密的精英特…

translation.en: The North Wind is an elite under...
translation.zh: 北风特工局是一个秘密的…

translation.en: An elite undercover interspecies...
translation.zh: 一个秘密的精英特工特遣…

translation.en: ...task...
translation.zh: 特遣…

translation.en: ...force, dedicated to help...
translation.zh: 特遣… 致力于帮助…

translation.en: helping...
translation.zh: 帮助…

translation.en: Dedicated to helping... (crunch)
translation.zh: 致力于帮助…

translation.en: (groans) Dedi...
translation.zh: 致力于…

translation.en: Dedicated to helping animals who can't help themselves.
translation.zh: 致力于帮助那些需要帮助的动物们

translation.en: Like penguins.
translation.zh: 比如说企鹅

translation.en: Really? And you are?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你的名字是？

translation.en: My name is classified.
translation.zh: 我的名字是机密

translation.en: Classified, eh? What is that, uh, Dutch?
translation.zh: 你说机什么？听着像是荷兰语

translation.en: Can't really hear the accent. Excuse me?
translation.zh: 听不懂你说什么 -你说什么？ -这句听懂了

translation.en: There's the accent.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -这句听懂了

translation.en: No, my name isn't Classified.
translation.zh: 我的名字不是“机密”

translation.en: My name is classified
translation.zh: 我的名字是机密

translation.en: because I am the leader of this strike team.
translation.zh: 因为我是这个突击队的领导

translation.en: The seal is Short Fuse-- weapons and explosives.
translation.zh: 这是海豹爆豹 擅长武器与爆破

translation.en: The bear is Corporal-- he's our muscle.
translation.zh: 这只熊叫大熊 是我们的骨干

translation.en: And the owl is Eva-- intelligence and analysis.
translation.zh: 这是猫头鹰伊娃 我们的情报分析师

translation.en: Well, Agent Classified,
translation.zh: 好吧 机密探员

translation.en: we happen to be an elite unit, too.
translation.zh: 我们刚巧也是一支精英小队

translation.en: (button clicks, alarm beeping)
translation.zh: 我们刚巧也是一支精英小队 自毁程序已经启动

translation.en: FEMALE VOICE: Self-destruct sequence activated.
translation.zh: 自毁程序已经启动

translation.en: You know, you should really label these things.
translation.zh: 你该把这些东西贴上标签的

translation.en: FEMALE VOICE: In three, two, one... (alarm stops)
translation.zh: 三、二、一

translation.en: The name's Skipper. I run this outfit.
translation.zh: 我叫老大 这个小队的头儿

translation.en: Back there is Kowalski. He's the brains of our operation.
translation.zh: 后面那位是科斯基 是我们的行动参谋

translation.en: Say something smart, Kowalski.
translation.zh: 说点机智的 科斯基

translation.en: See? He's working on a whole nother level.
translation.zh: 看 他简直是到了另一个境界

translation.en: And Rico, he's our demolition expert. (squawks, chuckles)
translation.zh: 还有 瑞哥 是我们小队的爆破专家

translation.en: SKIPPER: He destroyed that chair for the sheer fun of it.
translation.zh: 他把那个毁掉完全是出于乐趣

translation.en: No reason at all. And then there's Private.
translation.zh: 毫无理由的 这位是菜鸟

translation.en: He's, uh... he's sort of our, uh, you know, secretary/mascot.
translation.zh: 他是我们的秘书兼吉祥物

translation.en: Cute. And cuddly.
translation.zh: 很可爱 而且还很萌

translation.en: (chuckles) Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Well, let's see how well "cute and cuddly" handles this next bit.
translation.zh: 那我们就看看可爱和萌能起什么作用

translation.en: (chuckles) Nice doggy door.
translation.zh: 不错的狗狗门

translation.en: (beeping)
translation.zh: （北风特工局总部）

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Whoa. Wow. PRIVATE: Look at this.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这个

translation.en: SKIPPER: Well, well, well.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Not a bad place you got here, Classified.
translation.zh: 你这个地方还不错嘛 机密先生

translation.en: Thank you. That's not my name.
translation.zh: 谢谢 这不是我的名字

translation.en: FEMALE VOICE: Arrival at pad 17.
translation.zh: 到达 降落在17号

translation.en: All right, tiny penguins, the best way for the North Wind
translation.zh: 好吧 小企鹅们 北风特工局保护

translation.en: to protect helpless animals like yourselves
translation.zh: 你们这种无助的小动物的最佳方案

translation.en: is to bring Dr. Brine to justice.
translation.zh: 就是把布莱恩博士送上法庭

translation.en: Now, you were inside his sub,
translation.zh: 你们曾经去过他的潜艇

translation.en: so I need to know everything you know.
translation.zh: 所以请把知道的一切都告诉我

translation.en: PENGUINS: Hey!
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿

translation.en: Just tell me everything you know.
translation.zh: 赶紧把知道的一切都告诉我

translation.en: All right. Numero uno:
translation.zh: 好吧 第一条

translation.en: Never trust a Dutchman in a tulip fight.
translation.zh: -别在郁金香之争中相信荷兰人 -郁金香

translation.en: Tulip fight...
translation.zh: -别在郁金香之争中相信荷兰人 -郁金香 -加拿大正秘密训练大脚野人军队 -大脚野人

translation.en: Canada is secretly training an army of Sasquatch.
translation.zh: -加拿大正秘密训练大脚野人军队 -大脚野人

translation.en: Sasquatch... Hot dogs are, in fact,
translation.zh: 热狗只有17%是用狗肉做的

translation.en: only 17 percent actual dog. 17 percent...
translation.zh: 热狗只有17%是用狗肉做的 17% 不是你知道的所有事

translation.en: Not "everything" everything.
translation.zh: 17% 不是你知道的所有事

translation.en: Just everything regarding
translation.zh: 只要告诉我 奥克塔维布莱恩博士…

translation.en: your abduction by Dr. Octavius Brine.
translation.zh: 只要告诉我 奥克塔维布莱恩博士… （通缉） …绑架你们的细节

translation.en: Why didn't you say so? What?
translation.zh: -你怎么不早说？ -什么？

translation.en: My team has uncovered that Dr. Octavius Brine
translation.zh: 我的小队发现奥克塔维布莱恩博士

translation.en: is actually an individual known as Derek.
translation.zh: 真实的名字叫做戴瑞克

translation.en: Dave. As Dave the octopus.
translation.zh: 戴夫 叫戴夫 是条章鱼

translation.en: (chuckles) No.
translation.zh: 是条章鱼？

translation.en: Dr. Brine is not an octopus. He is...
translation.zh: 不 布莱恩博士 不是什么章鱼 他是…

translation.en: An octopus. (clears throat) Precisely.
translation.zh: 他是章鱼 （嫌犯）

translation.en: That's exactly what our intel indicated.
translation.zh: 这正是我们的情报人员告诉我们的

translation.en: (whispering): Release the sheep.
translation.zh: 把那头羊放了

translation.en: What you, of course, could not know
translation.zh: （海洋军事研究所） 但你们不可能知道的是

translation.en: is that Dr. Brine's laboratory in Venice
translation.zh: 但你们不可能知道的是 布莱恩博士在他威尼斯的实验室里

translation.en: is secretly developing a doomsday weapon
translation.zh: 秘密开发一种末日武器

translation.en: called the "Medusa Serum."
translation.zh: 叫做美杜莎血清

translation.en: Ah, but what you don't know is that Dirk... Dave.
translation.zh: -但你不知道的是 戴瑞克… -戴夫

translation.en: Dave won't be using his bazooka serum...
translation.zh: -戴夫 不会再拿没豆沙血清… -美杜莎血清

translation.en: Medusa Serum. Medusa Serum on anybody.
translation.zh: -戴夫 不会再拿没豆沙血清… -美杜莎血清 美杜莎血清攻击任何人了

translation.en: That part is accurate.
translation.zh: 这回说对了

translation.en: Show him, Rico.
translation.zh: 拿来吧 瑞哥

translation.en: You... You stole the Medusa Serum?
translation.zh: 你偷了美杜莎血清？

translation.en: Well, stole the serum, saved the day,
translation.zh: 偷了美杜莎血清 拯救世界

translation.en: did your job for you. Call it what you will.
translation.zh: 替你完成了任务 随你怎么说都行

translation.en: Debbie! Dave. Dave!
translation.zh: -是黛比 戴夫 -戴夫

translation.en: He hacked into our system.
translation.zh: 他侵入了我们的系统

translation.en: Where's the sound?
translation.zh: 怎么没声音

translation.en: D-Dave. I can't... I can't hear anything. Your microphone, it's not on.
translation.zh: -戴夫 你的麦克没开 -什么都听不见

translation.en: Click on the button with the picture of the microphone.
translation.zh: 按一下有麦克风图案的按钮

translation.en: Every time a villain calls in, this happens. Hello? Hello?
translation.zh: -每次坏人打过来都是这个样子 -你们好

translation.en: So annoying. Now we can hear you,
translation.zh: 现在能听见 但看不见图像了

translation.en: but we cannot see you. Every time.
translation.zh: 现在能听见 但看不见图像了 -烦人 每次都这样 -就像跟父母视频一样

translation.en: It's like talking to my parents.
translation.zh: -烦人 每次都这样 -就像跟父母视频一样

translation.en: How about now?
translation.zh: 现在怎么样？

translation.en: Hurray! Great! Yes, oh, yes!
translation.zh: -太棒了 对 -看到你了 真好

translation.en: Yes, we've got you; that's fantastic. Excellent. Now, where was I?
translation.zh: 好极了 我说到哪儿了？

translation.en: Dave! (growling, gasping)
translation.zh: 戴夫

translation.en: Greetings, North Wind.
translation.zh: 你们好 北风特工局

translation.en: I see you've met my old zoo-mates.
translation.zh: 你们已经见过我的老朋友了

translation.en: We were never mates. There was no mating.
translation.zh: 谁跟你是朋友？我可没那爱好

translation.en: Turn yourself in, David.
translation.zh: 赶快自首吧 戴夫

translation.en: You're powerless now that I've stolen
translation.zh: 你还有什么本事

translation.en: your precious Medusa Serum. What? You?
translation.zh: 我已经偷了你那宝贵的美杜莎血清 -什么？那不是你偷的 -都结束了

translation.en: You didn't steal that. It's over.
translation.zh: -什么？那不是你偷的 -都结束了

translation.en: It's over? Then why did I call you?
translation.zh: 都结束了？那我还打什么电话？

translation.en: Weird. Oh, maybe it was to show you this.
translation.zh: 奇怪 也许是想让你们看看这个

translation.en: (gasping) That is a lot of serum for four penguins.
translation.zh: 对付四只企鹅何必要那么多血清？

translation.en: Oh, you thought this was just about you four?
translation.zh: 你以为这只是你们四个的事儿？

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, no. We're just getting started.
translation.zh: 不 我们才刚刚开始

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go do some shopping...
translation.zh: 现在 请恕我失陪一下 我得去采购一点东西 用来复仇

translation.en: for revenge!
translation.zh: 我得去采购一点东西 用来复仇

translation.en: Wait, how do you... (burbling) What do I push?
translation.zh: 等等 怎么关这个？按哪个键？

translation.en: Is it the red or...
translation.zh: 是这个红的 还是…

translation.en: I thought it was the...
translation.zh: 是这个红的 还是… 我看是这个…不是这个

translation.en: It's not this...
translation.zh: 我看是这个…不是这个

translation.en: Incoming alert. Put it on the screen.
translation.zh: -有紧急情况 -转到大屏幕上

translation.en: The Berlin Zoo-- 15 penguins missing.
translation.zh: （警告） 柏林动物园15只企鹅失踪 （柏林）

translation.en: Dave's kidnapping other penguins!
translation.zh: 戴夫在绑架其他企鹅

translation.en: No doubt cute and cuddly.
translation.zh: 绑架那么可爱的企鹅

translation.en: BOTH: We have to move! What?
translation.zh: -得走了 什么？ -得走了 什么？

translation.en: Time for our A-game. Everybody, huddle up.
translation.zh: -该我们上场了 -大家过来

translation.en: Corporal, ready the jet.
translation.zh: 大熊 准备好飞机

translation.en: I'm initiating North Wind Protocol Zeta.
translation.zh: 我要启动“北风泽塔计划”

translation.en: 12 more penguins taken from London Zoo.
translation.zh: 伦敦动物园又失踪20只企鹅

translation.en: Okay, boys, this is it.
translation.zh: 好了 兄弟们 机会来了

translation.en: The mission we've been preparing for our entire lives.
translation.zh: 这是我们这辈子一直在等待的任务

translation.en: We're gonna take down Dave or die trying.
translation.zh: 不把戴夫铲除 誓不罢休

translation.en: Kowalski, cancel our improv class!
translation.zh: 科斯基 取消即兴表演课

translation.en: Yes, sir. Rico, equipify. Hi!
translation.zh: -是 老大 -瑞哥 负责装备

translation.en: Private, do that little thing I like.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 我最喜欢看什么？

translation.en: (laughs) It's still funny.
translation.zh: 还是那么搞笑

translation.en: Skipper, good news. I got them to credit our class.
translation.zh: 老大 好消息 这回取消表演课不扣钱

translation.en: Sir, the jet is ready.
translation.zh: 长官 飞机已经准备好了

translation.en: SKIPPER: Oh, yeah, baby! Whee! Just like Super Bowl 19!
translation.zh: 不错 就像第19届超级碗一样

translation.en: They're stealing my stuff!
translation.zh: 他们在偷我的东西

translation.en: (chuckles) No!
translation.zh: 不 这个任务不是

translation.en: This mission has no place for a pathetic waddle
translation.zh: 不 这个任务不是 摇来晃去的废物企鹅们能够完成的

translation.en: of useless penguins! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.zh: 摇来晃去的废物企鹅们能够完成的

translation.en: Who are you calling pathetic? Enough!
translation.zh: -你说谁是废物？ -够了

translation.en: See, Rico, that's why you can't have nice things.
translation.zh: 看 瑞哥 知道你为什么无法拥有好东西了吧？

translation.en: You know, uh, (grunts) I'm, uh, pretty good with computers myself.
translation.zh: 你知道 其实我也很懂电脑

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Put on your jammies, penguin.
translation.zh: 穿上睡衣吧 小家伙们

translation.en: Aw. They are even cute when they're asleep.
translation.zh: 他们睡着的时候更可爱

translation.en: Not to me.
translation.zh: 我不认为

translation.en: I want these butterballs out of my way
translation.zh: 我要这些小鸭子滚远一点儿

translation.en: and out of my mission.
translation.zh: 别掺合我的任务

translation.en: Ship them to one of our safe houses.
translation.zh: 把他们运到安全屋

translation.en: The most remote place on the planet.
translation.zh: 这个世界上最偏僻的地方

translation.en: (Skipper groans)
translation.zh: （国际快递 目的地：马达加斯加）

translation.en: Where the heck are we?
translation.zh: 我们这是在哪儿？

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Oxygen content is low.
translation.zh: 空气里的含氧量很低 （易碎品）

translation.en: I suggest we limit our breathing.
translation.zh: 建议各位尽量减弱呼吸

translation.en: SKIPPER: Aw, Private!
translation.zh: 菜鸟

translation.en: Sorry! I get gassy when I fly.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我一坐飞机就涨肚

translation.en: Toot sweet! He does.
translation.zh: 是这样 没错

translation.en: We must be on a plane.
translation.zh: 我们准是在飞机上

translation.en: What did North Wind do to us?
translation.zh: 北风特工局对我们做了什么？

translation.en: Ooh, they gave us badges.
translation.zh: 他们给了我们徽章

translation.en: Not badges, tranquilizer darts. Classified!
translation.zh: 不是徽章 这是麻醉镖 该死的机密

translation.en: That low-down dirty dog is trying kick us off the mission.
translation.zh: 这个无赖不想让我们插手这个任务

translation.en: He thinks we can't save the penguins
translation.zh: 他觉得我们无法拯救企鹅

translation.en: because we're just "penguins."
translation.zh: 因为我们只是企鹅

translation.en: Well, penguins are our flesh and feathers.
translation.zh: 那些企鹅跟我们血肉相连

translation.en: They're us. And if anyone's gonna save us, it's us.
translation.zh: 就是我们 能救我们的只有我们自己

translation.en: But, Skipper, we've got to be five miles up.
translation.zh: 但是老大 我们正在8千米的高空

translation.en: That pretty much limits our options.
translation.zh: 现在已经没有选择了

translation.en: I make my own options.
translation.zh: 我的选择我做主

translation.en: Brilliant move, Skipper,
translation.zh: 太帅了 老大

translation.en: but now we seem to be outside the plane.
translation.zh: 不过我们现在好像在飞机外面

translation.en: Well, kind of got caught up in the moment.
translation.zh: 我刚才也是脑袋一热

translation.en: Well, hindsight's 20/20.
translation.zh: 现在看来的确有点草率

translation.en: Okay, Kowalski, your turn to pick up the slack.
translation.zh: 好吧 科斯基 你来想想怎么善后

translation.en: Oh, why don't we catch that plane?
translation.zh: 我们可以搭那架飞机

translation.en: Bird strike, log it.
translation.zh: 鸟群撞击 记录下来

translation.en: KOWALSKI: We've got another target at 12 o'clock.
translation.zh: 发现了另一个目标 12点方向

translation.en: Good, it's only 11:30.
translation.zh: 好 才11点半

translation.en: Follow me, boys! We're going in hot.
translation.zh: 跟我来 兄弟们 我们要火速前进

translation.en: Hot, hot, hot! (gasping)
translation.zh: 火

translation.en: No one likes a show-off, Private.
translation.zh: 你就别炫耀了 菜鸟

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Aim for first class!
translation.zh: 目标头等舱

translation.en: (speaking French) I'm okay!
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Kowalski, where does this aircraft go?
translation.zh: 科斯基 这架飞机要去哪儿？

translation.en: From the odd shape of this bagel,
translation.zh: 根据这个面包圈的形状

translation.en: I'd say we're headed for Paris.
translation.zh: 我们应该正在飞往巴黎

translation.en: France? Forget it! Not with their tax laws!
translation.zh: 法国 算了吧 他们的税收太高了

translation.en: Then I would suggest a mid-air transfer.
translation.zh: 那么我建议空中转机

translation.en: Affirmative. Peanuts! Peanuts! Peanuts!
translation.zh: 这主意不错

translation.en: Peanuts, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut!
translation.zh: 花生 没有花生了 老大

translation.en: We're out of peanuts, Skipper! Try pretzels, Private.
translation.zh: 花生 没有花生了 老大 用椒盐饼 菜鸟

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: （香港） 漂亮 飞机来了 兄弟们 我得走了

translation.en: There's our ride, boys. Can't stay, doll.
translation.zh: 漂亮 飞机来了 兄弟们 我得走了

translation.en: Danger is my mistress.
translation.zh: 美女 危险是我的情人

translation.en: Aah! Rico, more height.
translation.zh: 瑞哥 飞高点儿

translation.en: Pretzels! Pretzel, pretzel, pretzels!
translation.zh: 椒盐饼 椒盐饼也没了

translation.en: We're out of pretzels! Yeah? Then we're leaving just time,
translation.zh: 椒盐饼 椒盐饼也没了 我们走得还真是时候

translation.en: 'cause these folks are gonna freak!
translation.zh: 这些人已经开始惊慌了

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Deploy flaps.
translation.zh: 展开机翼

translation.en: SKIPPER: Stay on target! (Rico chuckling)
translation.zh: 瞄准目标

translation.en: PRIVATE: We're gonna catch it, we're gonna catch it!
translation.zh: 会赶上的

translation.en: Crikey! We're not gonna catch it!
translation.zh: 我们赶不上了

translation.en: Wait a minute, where's Skipper?
translation.zh: 等一下 老大哪儿去了？

translation.en: Time to get creative. Start grabbing boxes, boys.
translation.zh: 要学会创新 快抓住那些盒子 兄弟们

translation.en: Going long! (laughs)
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Ooh!
translation.zh: （降落伞）

translation.en: Oh, Private, stop playing with those backpacks.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 别光摆弄那个背包了

translation.en: Find something useful.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 别光摆弄那个背包了 找点有用的

translation.en: (garbled grunting)
translation.zh: 找点有用的

translation.en: Now we're talking. Let's get to work.
translation.zh: 这才对 开始干活了

translation.en: 400 meters. 300 meters!
Speak American, Kowalski!
translation.zh: 说美国话 科斯基

translation.en: Sorry, sir. 218 yards. 109 yards.
translation.zh: 抱歉 长官 218码、109码

translation.en: Okay, then.
translation.zh: （充气城堡） 好了 接下来做什么已经很明确了

translation.en: It's clear what we need to do next.
translation.zh: 好了 接下来做什么已经很明确了

translation.en: (laughing, whooping)
translation.zh: （一个小时后）

translation.en: KOWALSKI: That feels right.
translation.zh: 这感觉真不错

translation.en: Impressive bouncing, boys.
translation.zh: 跳得很漂亮 兄弟们

translation.en: Now, then, back to civilization.
translation.zh: 现在 回到文明社会里来

translation.en: If we're gonna take Dexter down,
translation.zh: 如果想抓到戴夫的话

translation.en: we need to know where he's gonna strike next.
translation.zh: 得知道他下一步准备袭击哪儿
（里约热内卢）

translation.en: ALL: Goal...! (whistle blowing) ALL: Huh?
translation.zh: 进了

translation.en: Elijah, would you please take them away.
translation.zh: 伊利亚 能麻烦你把他们带走吗？

translation.en: EVA: Penguin footprints, still warm. We just missed Dave.
translation.zh: 企鹅的脚印是新鲜的 戴夫刚离开

translation.en: Aw, blast it, he's gone.
translation.zh: 又让他给跑了

translation.en: So many penguins!
translation.zh: 那么多的企鹅

translation.en: Boss! He's stress-eating again!
translation.zh: 老板 他又犯暴食症了

translation.en: Corporal? There, there.
translation.zh: -大熊 -好啦 没事了

translation.en: Rub the angry out of the tummy.
translation.zh: 揉揉肚肚不生气

translation.en: Corporal? Fo... focus.
translation.zh: 大熊 冷静点儿

translation.en: We are going to save those helpless penguins, because...
translation.zh: 我们要去救那些无助的企鹅 因为我们是北风特工局

translation.en: we are the North Wind, and no one...
translation.zh: 因为我们是北风特工局 没人能阻挡我们

translation.en: no one breaks the Wind.
translation.zh: 没人能阻挡我们

translation.en: (muffled): No one breaks the Wind.
translation.zh: 没人能阻挡我们

translation.en: There's a good Corporal.
translation.zh: 这才是好熊熊

translation.en: Now, we rescued those four penguins already, didn't we?
translation.zh: 我们已经救下了那四只企鹅 对不对？

translation.en: Shipped them off all cozy and snug
translation.zh: 我们已经救下了那四只企鹅 对不对？ 把他们送到了 马达加斯加温暖舒适的…

translation.en: (beeping) to a Madagascar... How come there's beeping?
translation.zh: 把他们送到了 马达加斯加温暖舒适的… 什么东西在响？

translation.en: Sir, those penguins--
translation.zh: 长官 那四只企鹅

translation.en: they never made it to Madagascar.
translation.zh: 根本就没到达马达加斯加

translation.en: (Corporal gasps) What? Well, where the dickens are they?
translation.zh: 什么？那他们现在在哪儿？

translation.en: Kowalski, what are our coordinates?
translation.zh: 科斯基 报告我们的精确位置

translation.en: From my calculations, we've arrived in the center
translation.zh: 根据我的计算 我们身处爱尔兰首都 都柏林

translation.en: of Dublin, Ireland.
translation.zh: 我们身处爱尔兰首都 都柏林

translation.en: ♪ ♪ (bicycle bell chimes)
translation.zh: （上海）

translation.en: All right, soldiers, we got to blend in.
translation.zh: 好吧 兄弟们 得入乡随俗

translation.en: Riverdance.
translation.zh: 大河之舞

translation.en: No time to kiss the Blarney stone, boys.
translation.zh: 没时间去亲巧言石了 兄弟们

translation.en: We need to find intel on Dave's location, pronto.
translation.zh: 我们得搞清楚戴夫所在的位置 要快

translation.en: All right, you, where's Dave!
translation.zh: 快告诉我戴夫在哪儿

translation.en: Give us the goods. Spit it out!
translation.zh: 快说话 别装傻 别逼我…

translation.en: Don't make me use shillelagh! Sir, that's... That's a baby squid.
translation.zh: -长官 他只是个鱿鱼宝宝 -…跟你发脾气

translation.en: Sorry, laddie.
translation.zh: 抱歉 孩子

translation.en: Stranded on the Emerald Isle without a single clue.
translation.zh: 就这么毫无头绪地困在这个破岛上

translation.en: Well, so much for the luck o' the Irish.
translation.zh: 我们跟爱尔兰的好运没缘分啊

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Skipper, look!
translation.zh: 老大 看啊

translation.en: SKIPPER: Begorrah! Does anyone speak Gaelic?
translation.zh: 上帝啊 有人懂盖尔语吗？

translation.en: No. But it looks like Dave's been busy.
translation.zh: 没有 不过看起来戴夫没闲着

translation.en: He's stolen penguins from Guadalajara!
translation.zh: 他从瓜达拉哈拉偷走了企鹅

translation.en: Madrid! Paris!
translation.zh: -马德里 -巴黎

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Athens! SKIPPER: Bangalore!
translation.zh: 雅典 班加罗尔

translation.en: (retches) KOWALSKI: Dusseldorf!
translation.zh: 杜塞尔多夫

translation.en: PRIVATE: Osaka! KOWALSKI: Rio de Janeiro!
translation.zh: 大阪 里约热内卢

translation.en: PRIVATE: Nairobi! SKIPPER: Amsterdam!
translation.zh: 内罗毕 阿姆斯特丹

translation.en: PRIVATE: Baton Rouge!
translation.zh: 巴吞鲁日

translation.en: Dave's snow globe collection.
translation.zh: 戴夫的雪花玻璃球藏品

translation.en: It's every zoo and aquarium he got kicked out of!
translation.zh: 他去了把他踢出来的动物园和水族馆

translation.en: Don't tell me where he has been,
translation.zh: 我不关心他去过哪儿

translation.en: tell me where he will have has been next.
translation.zh: 告诉我 他下一个目标是哪里

translation.en: (retching) Wait, what is it, Rico? It's a book!
translation.zh: 等等 是什么 瑞哥？

translation.en: It's a film! It's a play! (retching continues)
translation.zh: 是书？电影？舞台剧？

translation.en: First word. Two syllables.
translation.zh: 第一个字 两个音节

translation.en: Sounds like...
translation.zh: 听起来像…

translation.en: "huuh!" (retching continues)
translation.zh: 听起来像…

translation.en: Sounds like
translation.zh: 听起来像…

translation.en: "hyech!" What starts with "hyech"?
translation.zh: 听起来像… 什么地方打头是…？

translation.en: Shanghai.
translation.zh: 上海

translation.en: Dave hasn't been there yet, Skipper.
translation.zh: 戴夫还没去过那儿 老大

translation.en: If we hurry, we can still stop him.
translation.zh: 快一点儿 也许还能阻止他

translation.en: Nice work, Rico. Pack your bagpipes, boys.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 瑞哥 收拾好家伙 兄弟们

translation.en: It's time to blow this potato stand.
translation.zh: 我们该土豆搬家 滚球了

translation.en: (tires screech)
translation.zh: （国际快递）

translation.en: So this is it. Shanghai's famous Little Dublin district.
translation.zh: 这里就是上海最著名的小都柏林区

translation.en: (gasps) Skipper, look!
translation.zh: 老大 看啊

translation.en: I see you, Private. (laughs)
translation.zh: 看到你了 菜鸟

translation.en: Who's the big boy standing on his tippy-toes?
translation.zh: -这位踮着脚的大男孩是谁呀？ -什么？

translation.en: Wha...? No, I mean... I just want to eat you up.
translation.zh: -这位踮着脚的大男孩是谁呀？ -什么？ -不 我是说… -我真想把你一口吃掉

translation.en: Skipper, look! Above Private!
translation.zh: 老大 看 在菜鸟上面

translation.en: Dave's next target-- Shanghai's famous mermaid penguins.
translation.zh: 戴夫下个目标 上海著名的美人鱼企鹅

translation.en: SKIPPER: Good eye, Kowalski.
translation.zh: 好眼力 科斯基

translation.en: And once again,
translation.zh: 你再一次证明了自己

translation.en: you've proved that you are a meaningful
translation.zh: 你再一次证明了自己 是我们队伍里不可缺少的重要成员

translation.en: and valued member of this team.
translation.zh: 是我们队伍里不可缺少的重要成员

translation.en: MAN (over P.A.): Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: （上海海洋世界） 女士们 先生们

translation.en: Shanghai Marine World is pleased to present
translation.zh: 上海海洋世界很荣幸向大家介绍

translation.en: our world-famous Mermaid Penguins!
translation.zh: 世界闻名的美人鱼企鹅

translation.en: Tonight, our mermaids dedicate their performance
translation.zh: 今晚我们的美人鱼把它们的表演

translation.en: to all the missing penguins around the world.
translation.zh: 献给全世界失踪的企鹅

translation.en: Stay safe, little guys, wherever you are.
translation.zh: 愿你们平安 小家伙们 无论你们在哪里

translation.en: And we hope you come home real soon.
translation.zh: 我们都期盼你们尽快回家

translation.en: Now, keep those eyes roving, boys.
translation.zh: 都打起精神来 兄弟们

translation.en: Dave is a master of disguise.
translation.zh: 戴夫可是一个伪装大师

translation.en: He could be a small child, a house plant,

translation.en: Splendid! (giggles) Take positions.

translation.en: We need a diversion.

translation.en: I want to help the team. Really help the team.

translation.en: If you think I'm ready, which I am. (chuckles)

translation.en: Assuming you agree. And perhaps even... if you don't?

translation.en: I like the moxie, soldier, but right now,

translation.en: I need a tail on that tush and the cutest smile you've got.

translation.en: You trust me, soldier?

translation.en: Aye, aye, Skipper.

translation.en: MAN: Hey, it's feeding time!

translation.en: Private, you're up.

translation.en: You just mermaid my day.

translation.en: Flash is a go! (gasps)

translation.en: Look, they let one of the mermaids out of the tank!

translation.en: Oh, she's so cute.

translation.en: It's the cutest thing I've ever seen.

translation.en: Shields up!

translation.en: Target is stunned. Rico, bring the Splash.

translation.en: (people cheering)

translation.en: Oh, what are you doing out here, cutie?

translation.en: Come on.

translation.en: Back in your tank.

translation.en: Secure the mermaids and find me...

translation.en: ...David the octopus.

translation.en: (growls) Mission accomplished. High one!

translation.en: Corporal, take our prisoner--

translation.en: the one that belongs to us-- into custody.

translation.en: What?

translation.en: You melted him?! You birds are sick!

translation.en: Okay. Here we go.

translation.en: Skipper, the North Wind's plane.

translation.en: There's only one way to find out.

translation.en: No, I, uh...

translation.en: still can't read.

translation.en: No! No, no, no, no! (groans)

translation.en: SKIPPER: Too much, too much, too much, too much, too much!

translation.en: I'm getting the hang of this, Skipper.

translation.en: (muffled mumbling) EVA: Pull off!

translation.en: Good! We're coming for you, Private!

translation.en: Those ludicrous butterballs are letting David escape!

translation.en: Eva, secure transport.

translation.en: Fire!

translation.en: Go fetch.

translation.en: Hold her steady.

translation.en: We are too heavy.

translation.en: Oh, curse our heavily cheese-dibbled diet!

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Everything must go!

translation.en: Huh? What the... (screams)

translation.en: That's everything, sir.

translation.en: But Rico was in there for 15 minutes!

translation.en: Just do it! (toilet flushes)

translation.en: (gasps) No, no, no, no, no, no, no!

translation.en: (beeping) Self-destruct sequence

translation.en: in five, No, Private! four, Stay strong soldier!

translation.en: three, two, one.

translation.en: (screaming)

translation.en: Skipper's log.

translation.en: Private has been kidnapped by Dave,

translation.en: No rations, fresh water...

translation.en: Kowalski is sick as a dog.

translation.en: Just, please, just cut it out.

translation.en: Not sure how long we can hold on.

translation.en: This may be my final entry.

translation.en: 2004 Grand Cru. Hints of pear, white peaches.
translation.zh: 2004年 法国出产 有梨和白桃的香气

translation.en: EVA: Mmm, the salmon is delicious. SHORT FUSE: Oh, I have never

translation.en: been more hydrated in my life.

translation.en: Let me cut you a piece of the salmon. No, thank you.

translation.en: I'm stuffed. It's the most delicious thing

translation.en: on the boat. (sighs) I have to loosen
translation.zh: 我得松松腰带了

translation.en: my utility belt. No, I'm full.

translation.en: Just dump it in the ocean.

translation.en: You know, we're all in the same boat here.

translation.en: Actually, we're not.

translation.en: over the fact that you stole and destroyed

translation.en: a $19 million vehicle!

translation.en: Huh? It's five klicks southwest,

translation.en: but it stopped at that remote island.

translation.en: Land?

translation.en: No, silly willy.

translation.en: We've been tracking your little secretary/mascot.

translation.en: All of you, actually, when I darted you.

translation.en: (grumbles) You low-down, dirty, mangy, filthy,

translation.en: flea-bitten, bum-sniffing toilet drinker!

translation.en: But... good.

translation.en: See, I told you.

translation.en: (sighs) 892.
DAVE: Ahoy there! ♪ Penguins. ♪

translation.en: I bet you're all just dying to know why I brought you here.

translation.en: (gasps) He's gonna kill us all!

translation.en: What? (chuckles) No.

translation.en: Something much, much worse.

translation.en: Well, that's exactly what I came up here to show you.

translation.en: All I need is a test subject.

translation.en: Hello, little buggy-boo!

translation.en: Is this about the chirping? 'Cause I could... Whoa!

translation.en: Behold, as I unleash

translation.en: the full power of the Medusa Serum.

translation.en: I made a monster. (jaws snap) I made a monster!

translation.en: No. No. No.

translation.en: (burbling): Oh, hey.

translation.en: You'll never get away with this, Dave.

translation.en: My brothers are coming,

translation.en: and together we'll take a wrecking ball

translation.en: to your whole rotten operation.

translation.en: Call off the hunt, everyone.

translation.en: My count is 30 hostiles.

translation.en: KOWALSKI: 31.
Uh, those two are very close together.

translation.en: I-I mean, you know, intertwined,

translation.en: physically, but... but not in, uh...

translation.en: Poor Private.

translation.en: Alone, helpless in the belly of that beast.

translation.en: We've faced some long odds before, Skipper,

translation.en: but these look like the longest and oddest.

translation.en: If we're gonna pull this off, we'll need a diversion.

translation.en: FEMALE COMPUTER VOICE: Deactivating jungle camouflage.

translation.en: Shh! Would you be quiet? Listen, Classified... Short Fuse,
translation.zh: -给我安静点儿 -听着 机密

translation.en: you were supposed to handcuff them to the rock!

translation.en: Don't you hologram me!

translation.en: I tried, but they don't have hands.

translation.en: They just have flippers, boss.

translation.en: And-and I have flippers!
translation.zh: 我的手也不分缝儿

translation.en: So it's flipping useless!
translation.zh: 所以根本没法绑

translation.en: (growls) All right, pooch.

translation.en: If you won't work with us,

translation.en: you better work for us.
translation.zh: 那就给我们打工吧

translation.en: Our plan requires a diversion.

translation.en: I give the orders around here.
translation.zh: 我才是这里的指挥官 尽管这很头疼

translation.en: Much as it pains me, I need you to act as our diversion
translation.zh: 我才是这里的指挥官 尽管这很头疼 我要你来做我们诱敌行动中的诱饵

translation.en: for our operation, understood?
translation.zh: 我要你来做我们诱敌行动中的诱饵 -听明白了吗？ -不 这是我们的计划

translation.en: Nope! This is our plan,
translation.zh: -听明白了吗？ -不 这是我们的计划

translation.en: and it requires you to cause a diversion.

translation.en: Die-version. Dih-version.
translation.zh: 是我来命令你充当邮递 -诱敌 -邮递

translation.en: Die, die, die, die, die, die! Dih, dih, dih, dih, dih, dih!
translation.zh: -诱 -邮

translation.en: Gentlemen,
translation.zh: -诱 -邮 先生们 只有一个办法 能解决这个问题

translation.en: there is only one way to resolve this.
translation.zh: 先生们 只有一个办法 能解决这个问题

translation.en: We should kiss. Plan-off.
translation.zh: -应该亲亲 -投票

translation.en: Yep, plan-off. That's what I was gonna say.
translation.zh: 没错 投票 我就想这么说的

translation.en: (sighs): Plan-off.
translation.zh: 投票吧

translation.en: Here's Dave's sub.
translation.zh: 这是戴夫的潜艇

translation.en: helpless, vulnerable rock
translation.zh: 这个小小的、无助的 脆弱的石头就是菜鸟

translation.en: is Private.
translation.zh: 脆弱的石头就是菜鸟

translation.en: And here's Dave.
translation.zh: 这就是戴夫

translation.en: While you four blowhards dih-vert the octopi,
translation.zh: 你们四个大话王去分散他的注意力

translation.en: we strike fast and strike hard!
translation.zh: 我们趁机快速猛攻

translation.en: Get on in here, boys!
translation.zh: 快过来呀 兄弟们

translation.en: Slap him silly, Rico! Come on!

translation.en: (others whooping) SKIPPER: Kowalski, free the hostages!
translation.zh: 使劲打他 瑞哥 使劲儿 科斯基 去解救人质

translation.en: Now, that's what I'm talking about, big fella!
translation.zh: 我就是要这样的效果 大个子

translation.en: With Private freshly liberated,
translation.zh: 等菜鸟被救出之后

translation.en: we celebrate with a well-earned high one,

translation.en: and feast off Dave's sweet remains.
translation.zh: 然后把戴夫留下的一扫而光

translation.en: Any questions?

translation.en: Whoa-hoa, hey, now!
translation.zh: 小子

translation.en: Wow. I mean, truly impressive.
translation.zh: 真是让人印象深刻

translation.en: Especially... the bit where you slap the fruit.
translation.zh: 特别是你抽打水果那段

translation.en: My apologies. Had to rush a bit.
translation.zh: 真是抱歉 准备仓促

translation.en: ♪ ♪ The schematic's a little crude.
translation.zh: 这个计划还有点粗糙

translation.en: Where is that music coming from?
