translation.en: Wow. AGENT CLASSIFIED: All right, at 2150, Skipper,
translation.zh: 听好了 晚上9点50分 老大 科斯基 还有 瑞查德 对吗？

translation.en: Kowalski and-- Richard, was it?--
translation.zh: 老大 科斯基 还有 瑞查德 对吗？

translation.en: die-vert the octopi away from their posts.
translation.zh: 把戴夫的人从哨岗上引开

translation.en: At 2200, Short Fuse
translation.zh: 晚上10点整

translation.en: breaches the hull with a swarm of self-guided underwater nano-charges.
translation.zh: 爆豹用一组微型水下自导雷破开船体

translation.en: I call them "wet kabooms."
translation.zh: 我把这叫水下咔嘣

translation.en: Yes, please don't.
translation.zh: -好了 别闹了 -好的 抱歉

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Okay, sorry. At 2202,
translation.zh: -好了 别闹了 -好的 抱歉 到10点02分 咚咚

translation.en: knock, knock. Who's there?
translation.zh: 到10点02分 咚咚 -是谁呀？ -北风特工局

translation.en: The North Wind.
translation.zh: -是谁呀？ -北风特工局

translation.en: The North Wind who? The North Wind who doesn't
translation.zh: 北风特什么？ 我们没空玩这种游戏

translation.en: have time for knock-knock jokes because we're too busy
translation.zh: （动力监测） 因为我们正忙着收拾戴夫

translation.en: taking down Dave.
translation.zh: 因为我们正忙着收拾戴夫

translation.en: Personal hover tank... (echoing): check.
translation.zh: 单兵水下穿梭机 检查完毕

translation.en: Auto-targeting wing mounts. Why not?
translation.zh: 自适应机载火箭炮 当然要带上

translation.en: mission accomplished.
translation.zh: 任务顺利完成

translation.en: See that? I don't even look back.
translation.zh: 请看 连头都不回一下

translation.en: There's a huge explosion, and I just keep walking.
translation.zh: 身后炸得天翻地覆 我潇洒而去

translation.en: Way to go, boss! That's North Wind,
translation.zh: 帅呆了 老板 这才叫特工 笨蛋

translation.en: sucker! Nicely done.
translation.zh: 帅呆了 老板 这才叫特工 笨蛋 干得漂亮

translation.en: A good plan is about more than effecty stuff and...
translation.zh: 好的计划可不只是炫耀特技

translation.en: vocabulary words.
translation.zh: 和煽情的配音

translation.en: (chuckles): Oh. And you, you... you certainly know
translation.zh: 当然了 你是最会制订计划的

translation.en: a good plan-- I mean, your operation in Shanghai
translation.zh: 当然了 你是最会制订计划的 你在上海的行动

translation.en: allowed Dave to escape with... your boy.
translation.zh: 让戴夫带着你的兄弟跑掉了

translation.en: I've never lost a member of my team.
translation.zh: 我倒是从没有失去过队员

translation.en: It must feel... awful.
translation.zh: 那感觉肯定很糟

translation.en: Can't imagine the guilt, the regret,
translation.zh: 你得多内疚？悔死了吧

translation.en: the feeling that, uh, I don't know, that...
translation.zh: 那种感觉 什么滋味儿？

translation.en: (sputtering exhale) it should have been you.
translation.zh: 那种感觉 什么滋味儿？ 都是你的错

translation.en: All for penguin plan?
translation.zh: 选企鹅的举手

translation.en: All for North Wind plan?
translation.zh: 选北风特工局的举手

translation.en: His... his is better. (grunts) What?
translation.zh: -他的确实更好 -什么？

translation.en: I'm sorry, boys, but I can't lead you this time.
translation.zh: 抱歉 兄弟们 这次我不能领导行动了

translation.en: But... (sighs) we're a team, and...
translation.zh: 但是 我们是一个团队

translation.en: and you're our skipper, Skipper.
translation.zh: 你是我们的老大

translation.en: We don't... we don't need these guys.
translation.zh: 老大 我们不需要这些人

translation.en: No, Kowalski, but Private does.
translation.zh: 没错 科斯基 但菜鸟需要

translation.en: I think... it's time we leave it to the professionals.
translation.zh: 所以我想 这次还是让专家们来搞定吧

translation.en: But, sir... It's settled.
translation.zh: 但是 长官 就这么定了 现在都听从特工机密指挥

translation.en: We take our orders from Agent Classified now.
translation.zh: 就这么定了 现在都听从特工机密指挥

translation.en: (grunting) That's an order, Rico!
translation.zh: 这是命令 瑞哥

translation.en: All right, Classified... what's the diversion?
translation.zh: 好吧 特工机密 诱敌方案是什么？

translation.en: (quietly): We take this shame to our graves.
translation.zh: 这种丢人的事儿绝对不许外传

translation.en: Agreed.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: Time? 2200 hours.
translation.zh: -时间？ -晚上10点整

translation.en: Time to take down Dave.
translation.zh: 是时候拿下戴夫了

translation.en: David the octopus, show me your tentacles.
translation.zh: 你被捕了戴夫 把你的触手举起来

translation.en: All of them.
translation.zh: 所有触手

translation.en: We lost them, Skipper. Not a moment too soon.
translation.zh: 甩掉他们了 老大 时机刚刚好

translation.en: These hosen are riding up my bundesliga.
translation.zh: 这该死的裤子可真让我蛋疼

translation.en: All right, boys, grab your coconuts
translation.zh: 好了 兄弟们 把椰子壳放在耳朵上捂紧了

translation.en: and hold 'em tight.
translation.zh: 把椰子壳放在耳朵上捂紧了

translation.en: Classified should be walking away from a huge explosion
translation.zh: 特工机密马上就会扛着菜鸟

translation.en: with Private on his shoulder in three... two...
translation.zh: 从大爆炸中走出来 倒计时三、二 来点欢迎仪式 瑞哥

translation.en: Give 'em a welcome home, Rico!
translation.zh: 倒计时三、二 来点欢迎仪式 瑞哥

translation.en: Whoo-hoo! Yeah! In your face, Dave!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 伙计

translation.en: The Private is back! Welcome home, Private!
translation.zh: 菜鸟回来了 欢迎回来 菜鸟

translation.en: Yeah! All right!
translation.zh: 菜鸟回来了 欢迎回来 菜鸟 好了 先等等

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 好了 先等等

translation.en: All right. Sir, the sub didn't explode, and, uh... (clears throat)
translation.zh: 我说 长官 潜艇没有爆炸

translation.en: I fear the... fireworks may have been a tactical mistake.
translation.zh: 而且 使用烟火是个战术上的失误

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Stay calm! Do not panic!
translation.zh: 冷静点 千万不要慌

translation.en: We will still win!
translation.zh: 胜利是我们的

translation.en: Be full of love! Don't hate! Follow your dreams!
translation.zh: 要充满友爱 不要抱怨 跟随梦想

translation.en: Love yourself! Love other people!
translation.zh: 爱自己 也要爱别人

translation.en: Pick and choose your battles in life!
translation.zh: 把命运掌握在自己的手中

translation.en: Don't let anyone tell you what to do!
translation.zh: 不要听凭别人的摆布

translation.en: Ignore the haters!
translation.zh: 不要听凭别人的摆布 不要在乎旁人的责难 爱你身边的人

translation.en: Love the one you're with!
translation.zh: 不要在乎旁人的责难 爱你身边的人

translation.en: Love the one you're with! Eva.
translation.zh: -爱你身边的每一个人 -伊娃

translation.en: (softly): I know.
translation.zh: 我知道 一定要脚踏实地 还要…

translation.en: Welcome, Skipper, Kowalski and rootin'-tootin' Rico! The gang's all here!
translation.zh: 欢迎老大 科斯基 还有欢乐的瑞哥

translation.en: The mood is electric!
translation.zh: 大家都来了 真是令人兴奋

translation.en: Is this really, finally everybody?
translation.zh: 这回是真的都到齐了吗？

translation.en: All right, Dave, just what have you done with...
translation.zh: 好吧 戴夫 你到底把他…

translation.en: Private!
translation.zh: 菜鸟

translation.en: Oh! Guys! You're in for it now, Dave!
translation.zh: 各位 现在该知道害怕了吧 戴夫？

translation.en: Really?!
translation.zh: 是吗？叙旧时间结束了

translation.en: Anyway, great catching up.
translation.zh: 是吗？叙旧时间结束了 现在 谁准备好接受企鹅活体试验？

translation.en: Now, who's ready to move on to live penguin testing?
translation.zh: 现在 谁准备好接受企鹅活体试验？

translation.en: SKIPPER: You point that death ray away from Private
translation.zh: 把死光从菜鸟身上拿开 马上

translation.en: right now! It's not a death ray, Skipper.
translation.zh: 把死光从菜鸟身上拿开 马上 这不是死光 老大

translation.en: He's gonna turn us into monsters! Yepper-doo!
translation.zh: -这东西会把我们变成怪物的 -说得对

translation.en: "And what comes next, Dave?"
translation.zh: 然后会发生什么呢 戴夫？

translation.en: Invasion!
translation.zh: 入侵

translation.en: Oh, horrible mutant penguins
translation.zh: 一群恐怖的变种企鹅

translation.en: unleashed on the streets of New York City!
translation.zh: 覆盖了纽约的大街小巷

translation.en: You're the monster!
translation.zh: 你就是个怪物

translation.en: I'm the monster.
translation.zh: 对 我就是怪物 在我这一生中

translation.en: Everyone made that clear to me every day of my entire life.
translation.zh: 对 我就是怪物 在我这一生中 大家时刻都在提醒我这一点

translation.en: But now, let's see how much everyone loves you
translation.zh: 但是等你变成怪物后 看看人们还会不会这么爱你

translation.en: when you're the monster! Skipper!
translation.zh: 看看人们还会不会这么爱你

translation.en: SKIPPER: You can't take away
translation.zh: 老大

translation.en: Private's cuteness!
translation.zh: 你无法夺去菜鸟的萌劲

translation.en: He's the cute one! That's-that's his thing.
translation.zh: -他人见人爱 -这是天生的 对

translation.en: What? It's all the little guy's got!
translation.zh: -什么？ -这个小家伙只会萌

translation.en: You are super cute. We better crank this up.
translation.zh: 你确实是超级可爱型 看来得把量加大

translation.en: Drew, Barry, more power. Ready?
translation.zh: 德鲁 拜瑞 能量上调 好了吗？

translation.en: Negotiations have broken down.
translation.zh: 很明显谈判破裂了

translation.en: Rico, the paper clip! Bust us out of here!
translation.zh: 瑞哥 上曲别针 我们得离开这儿

translation.en: We need that paper clip! Chop-chop, soldier!
translation.zh: 我们需要的是曲别针 快 大兵

translation.en: No! Where's the paper clip!
translation.zh: 不 曲别针呢？

translation.en: (strained grunting) Private!
translation.zh: 不 菜鸟

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Private... Oh, no.
translation.zh: -菜鸟 -不

translation.en: I disintegrated him.
translation.zh: 难道我把他给分解了？

translation.en: That wasn't supposed to happen.
translation.zh: 不应该出这种事情

translation.en: You maniac! You blew him up!
translation.zh: 你这疯子 你把他炸飞了

translation.en: (groans) No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Oh, well, this is why we test things, people.
translation.zh: 好了 这就是为什么我们要做试验

translation.en: I'll have to lower the power for the others.
translation.zh: 下次在其他人身上得降低点能量

translation.en: Full speed ahead, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 全速前进 兄弟们

translation.en: The monsters are due in Manhattan!
translation.zh: 还得把这些怪物送到曼哈顿去

translation.en: PRIVATE: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Crikey.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: All right, all right, octopus.
translation.zh: 好吧 小章鱼

translation.en: Whatever Dave's paying you, I'll double it.
translation.zh: 戴夫给你多少钱 我给双倍

translation.en: Is that a yes? Does anyone speak octopus?
translation.zh: 算是答应了吗？有谁懂章鱼语

translation.en: Sorry. No, not a clue. Blast it.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -不 我可不懂 该死的

translation.en: You... free... us.
translation.zh: 你放了我们

translation.en: We give you... many fishes.
translation.zh: 我们给你很多鱼

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 这是什么东西？

translation.en: Oh, great. Oh, no! This is it!
translation.zh: -太棒了 -不 完蛋了

translation.en: CORPORAL: I don't want to die all squishy!
translation.zh: 我可不想被这东西挤成肉泥

translation.en: We're dead! Dead! Dead! Dead!
translation.zh: 死定了 死了

translation.en: Oh, no, we're dead!
translation.zh: 不 我们死了

translation.en: Dead!
translation.zh: 不 我们死了 死了

translation.en: Dead...!
translation.zh: 死了

translation.en: I pushed a button.
translation.zh: 我只是按了个按钮

translation.en: (chuckles) Super. Well done, Private!
translation.zh: 太好了 干得好 菜鸟

translation.en: Good work, malinki.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 亲爱的

translation.en: Yay. Yes. Yes. Um... excellent button-pushing. Hmm.
translation.zh: 对 太棒了 按得真棒

translation.en: Compliment, praise, et cetera.
translation.zh: 非常值得表扬

translation.en: All right, agents, we are back in business.
translation.zh: 好了 特工们 继续执行任务吧

translation.en: Wait! Skipper, Kowalski, Rico,
translation.zh: 等一下 老大 科斯基 瑞哥

translation.en: all those penguins, they're this way!
translation.zh: 那些被抓的企鹅在这边

translation.en: And so is a massive army of octopi.
translation.zh: 可是章鱼大军也在那边

translation.en: And as soon as we return to the North Wind headquarters,
translation.zh: 我们现在先回到北风局总部

translation.en: grab fresh equipment, and work up a smashing new plan,
translation.zh: 拿到新装备 重新制定一个无敌的新计划

translation.en: we'll come speeding back and take down Dave.
translation.zh: 再火速赶回来 打败戴夫

translation.en: But the penguins are in danger! We have to go now!
translation.zh: 可那些企鹅很危险 得赶快去救他们

translation.en: Again, huge army of octopi.
translation.zh: 听着 那边有章鱼大军

translation.en: So, because you failed once, you're just running away?
translation.zh: 你失败过一次 就要当逃兵 是吧？

translation.en: We did not fail.
translation.zh: 我们没有失败过

translation.en: And we are not running away.
translation.zh: 我们现在也不是当逃兵

translation.en: We're just very sensibly regrouping.
translation.zh: 我们只是在明智地重新部署

translation.en: Skipper wouldn't care.
translation.zh: 老大就不会这样

translation.en: Plan or no, fancy equipment or no...
translation.zh: 有没有计划 有没有高精尖设备

translation.en: he'd never leave a man behind.
translation.zh: 他都不会丢下兄弟的

translation.en: Well, I suppose we can't all be penguins, can we?
translation.zh: 我们不能跟企鹅一样无知无畏

translation.en: No. But maybe you should be.
translation.zh: 不 要真是这样就好了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Showtime, everyone! Big smiles for the Big Apple!
translation.zh: 好戏要开始了 纽约在等着你们呢

translation.en: Listen up, Doris!
translation.zh: 你听着 道瑞斯

translation.en: You turn us into freaks, and then what?
translation.zh: 你把我们变成怪物 又能怎么样？

translation.en: You think that's gonna make everybody love you?
translation.zh: 你以为这样就能 让所有人都喜欢你吗？

translation.en: No, but they'll despise you.
translation.zh: 不 但所有人都会讨厌你们

translation.en: And I'm sure gonna love that.
translation.zh: 而且那会让我很开心

translation.en: REPORTER: Breaking news!
translation.zh: （即时新闻 企鹅危机）

translation.en: The missing penguins have been found!
translation.zh: 即时新闻 失踪的企鹅找到了

translation.en: Okay. According to my notes, genetic researcher
translation.zh: 好的 根据我的记录 遗传研究专家奥克塔维布莱恩

translation.en: Dr. Octavius Brine has found the penguins
translation.zh: 遗传研究专家奥克塔维布莱恩 发现了企鹅们

translation.en: and is bringing them here to New York's Battery Park.
translation.zh: 并准备带它们回纽约炮台公园

translation.en: The penguins are coming back! Oh, my gosh! Look!
translation.zh: 企鹅回来了！我的天哪 看啊！

translation.en: Penguin lovers of the world, guess who I found.
translation.zh: 各位企鹅爱好者们 猜我找到了什么？

translation.en: CROWD (chanting): Penguins! Penguins!
translation.zh: 企鹅

translation.en: It wasn't easy, but seeing the penguins get what they deserve
translation.zh: 这很不容易 但看到企鹅们得到应得的对待

translation.en: will make it all worthwhile.
translation.zh: 这一切都是值得的

translation.en: What a weird thing to say! I'm so excited!
translation.zh: 多么独特的演讲 我太激动了！

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手吧

translation.en: Skipper! Skipper! Skipper! Rico! Kowalski!
translation.zh: 老大 瑞哥 科斯基 我在这儿

translation.en: I'm up here! Up here! It's like I can
translation.zh: 我好像还能听到他微弱的声音

translation.en: still hear his little voice calling to us.
translation.zh: 我好像还能听到他微弱的声音 呼唤着我们

translation.en: You have to get out of there! Move!
translation.zh: 你们赶快离开这儿 快走

translation.en: "You have a great otter, there. Moo."
translation.zh: “你们赶着老牛车 哞”

translation.en: Why would he moo?
translation.zh: 他为什么要“哞”？

translation.en: What are you asking me for? I'm not Private's little ghost.
translation.zh: 问我有什么用？ 我又不是菜鸟的小鬼魂

translation.en: (whirring) No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Are you ready?!
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: (crowd cheering) Yeah!
translation.zh: 准好了！

translation.en: (laughs)
translation.zh: （释放企鹅）

translation.en: Your new... and improved... penguins!
translation.zh: 全新的、改良型的企鹅

translation.en: CROWD (chanting): Penguins! Penguins! (chanting continues)
translation.zh: 企鹅！

translation.en: (chanting stops)
translation.zh: 企鹅！

translation.en: Wha...?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh, the people love you. Just go give them a hug.
translation.zh: 大家喜欢你们 去给他们一个拥抱

translation.en: Don't let them touch you!
translation.zh: 可别让它们碰到

translation.en: Oh, no. What's happening?
translation.zh: 不 这是怎么了？

translation.en: Nobody likes you anymore?
translation.zh: 没人喜欢你们了吗？

translation.en: Well, the fun and games are just beginning.
translation.zh: 好玩儿的游戏刚开始

translation.en: Watch this, penguins. Somebody call...
translation.zh: 看看这些企鹅们 这太恐怖了

translation.en: the exterminators!
translation.zh: 快叫灭虫专家

translation.en: And when the exterminators take you away, you never come back.
translation.zh: 等到灭虫专家来把你们抓走 就永远都回不来了

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no. What do I do? What do I do?
translation.zh: 不 该怎么办？

translation.en: Come on, then. You want to go? You want some argy-bargy?
translation.zh: 过来 想打架吗？ 想让我痛扁你们吗？

translation.en: Uh-oh, missed one.
translation.zh: 差点跑了一只

translation.en: What a wonderful day in the park.
translation.zh: 多么美好的一天

translation.en: Skipper!
translation.zh: 老大

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Hold on! What are you doing?!
translation.zh: 等一下 你在干什么？

translation.en: Skipper!
translation.zh: 老大

translation.en: (gasps) Don't eat that!
translation.zh: 别吃它

translation.en: Skipper, listen. It's me, Private.
translation.zh: 老大 听着 是我 菜鸟

translation.en: I've got a plan, but I need your help.
translation.zh: 我有个计划 但需要你的帮助

translation.en: I need my Skipper.
translation.zh: 我需要我的老大

translation.en: (garbled): Private? Yes. That's it.
translation.zh: -菜鸟？ -没错 是我

translation.en: (normal voice): Private, you're alive!
translation.zh: 菜鸟 你还活着

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 上帝啊

translation.en: Kowalski! (garbled): Huh? You've got to get a grip!
translation.zh: 科斯基 要控制住自己

translation.en: Kowalski, Eva is worried about you.
translation.zh: 科斯基 伊娃现在很担心你

translation.en: (normal voice): She is?
translation.zh: 科斯基 伊娃现在很担心你 真的吗？她说什么了？

translation.en: Wh-What did she say?
translation.zh: 真的吗？她说什么了？

translation.en: Did she say my name specifically?
translation.zh: 她提我的名字了吗？

translation.en: I mean, were there... were there tears?
translation.zh: 我是说她流泪了吗？

translation.en: Details, come on, tell me!
translation.zh: 细节 快点 告诉我

translation.en: Private! You're alive. Come here.
translation.zh: 菜鸟 你还活着 太好了

translation.en: This feels a little awkward, but I'm happy.
translation.zh: 感觉有点儿怪怪的 不过很开心

translation.en: SKIPPER: Rico! You need to listen to us. (burps)
translation.zh: 瑞哥 你得听我们说

translation.en: I guess you're kind of the same either way.
translation.zh: 我看你怎么变也是那个德行

translation.en: (garbled): Private! (sighs) Heads up!
translation.zh: -菜鸟 -小心

translation.en: Looks like we're back in business, boys.
translation.zh: 看来我们的事业还要继续 兄弟们

translation.en: And our business is saving penguin-kind.
translation.zh: 我们的目标就是拯救企鹅一族

translation.en: Who's with me?
translation.zh: 谁想跟我来？

translation.en: Count me in. (Rico gurgles) Let's do this! Boo-hah!
translation.zh: -算我一个 -大干一场

translation.en: Yeah! Let's create and feel momentum.
translation.zh: 让我们创造和感受力量

translation.en: Sir, how long do we stand here like this?
translation.zh: 长官 我们要这样在这儿站多久？

translation.en: Until we've reached maximum coolness.
translation.zh: 直到酷的不能再酷为止

translation.en: There it is. Now all we need is a plan.
translation.zh: 就是这样 现在需要的是计划

translation.en: I've got one. Eh? Uh, huh?
translation.zh: 我有一个

translation.en: (chuckles): You stole Dave's ray?
translation.zh: 你偷了戴夫的发射器？

translation.en: Well, I figured if we could reverse the ray,
translation.zh: 我觉得如果能逆转射线的话

translation.en: we could turn everyone back to normal.
translation.zh: 就可以让所有人恢复正常了

translation.en: Reverse the ray? That's brilliant! (grunting)
translation.zh: -逆转射线？ -太聪明了

translation.en: But... it's impossible!
translation.zh: 但是 这是不可能的

translation.en: In order to reverse the ray,
translation.zh: 要想让射线逆转

translation.en: we would need to replace the Medusa Serum with a power source
translation.zh: 我们得把美杜莎血清替换成一种 可爱到几乎无法抵抗的能源

translation.en: of almost immeasurable cuteness.
translation.zh: 可爱到几乎无法抵抗的能源

translation.en: Immeasurable cuteness?
translation.zh: 可爱到无法抵抗

translation.en: Where the heck are we supposed to get that?
translation.zh: 到哪儿去找这样的能源呢？

translation.en: No, wait. Private, no!
translation.zh: 等等 菜鸟 不要

translation.en: We don't know what that will do to you! Aah!
translation.zh: 我们不能让你这样去冒险

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: The ray! It works! It works!
translation.zh: 这射线 起作用了

translation.en: Private! Are you okay? Yes!
translation.zh: -菜鸟 你还好吧？ -很好

translation.en: Yah! Whoa-oh! Butt-hand! There's a hand attached to his butt.
translation.zh: 屁股手 他的屁股上长着一只手

translation.en: That was not... that was not there before.
translation.zh: 以前那儿可没有手

translation.en: Get out of there! That's an order!
translation.zh: 快离开那里 这是命令

translation.en: Permission to defy order.
translation.zh: 请允许我违抗命令

translation.en: Permission denied!
translation.zh: 否决你的请求

translation.en: Then I deny your denial.
translation.zh: 那我就否决你的否决

translation.en: It's too risky, Private.
translation.zh: 太危险了 菜鸟

translation.en: It already made you sprout a butt-hand!
translation.zh: 你屁股上已经长出一只手了

translation.en: I know it has to be me this time.
translation.zh: 但是我知道这次非我不可

translation.en: And I think you know it, too.
translation.zh: 我觉得你也很清楚

translation.en: I'm the secret weapon.
translation.zh: 我就是秘密武器

translation.en: I'm happy... and yet...
translation.zh: 我真高兴

translation.en: now that I have my revenge,
translation.zh: 现在我已经报了仇

translation.en: I feel... empty,
translation.zh: 现在我已经报了仇 却感觉空虚 就好像

translation.en: as if what I needed all along was...
translation.zh: 却感觉空虚 就好像 我自始至终想要的是…不停地复仇

translation.en: more revenge!
translation.zh: 我自始至终想要的是…不停地复仇

translation.en: In fact-- Robin, write this down--
translation.zh: 事实上 罗宾 记录下来

translation.en: tomorrow we move on to kittens!
translation.zh: 明天我们就可以对小猫

translation.en: Then puppies, bunnies, pandas... (gasps)
translation.zh: 小狗、小兔子、熊猫

translation.en: Charlize, they're on the ray!
translation.zh: 查理兹 发射器被偷了

translation.en: Helen, hunt them down!
translation.zh: 海伦 快去抓他们

translation.en: William, hurt them.
translation.zh: 威廉 制服他们

translation.en: Halle, bury them!
translation.zh: 哈莉 活埋他们

translation.en: Hugh, Jack, man the battle stations!
translation.zh: 休 杰克坚守战斗岗位

translation.en: Kevin, bake on!
translation.zh: 凯文 继续烤

translation.en: We're still gonna need that victory cake!
translation.zh: 我们庆祝胜利需要有蛋糕来切

translation.en: We're only gonna get one shot at this, boys!
translation.zh: 这次我们一定要一击击中 兄弟们

translation.en: How we doing on those snow globes?
translation.zh: 那些雪花玻璃球装得怎么样了？

translation.en: (Rico retches) Beam splitter ready! Fire at will!
translation.zh: 分光镜准备完毕 随时待命

translation.en: Do it, Skipper!
translation.zh: 动手吧 老大

translation.en: (beeping)
translation.zh: （电量低）

translation.en: Dead batteries?!
translation.zh: 电池没电了

translation.en: (gasps) Game over, Skipper!
translation.zh: 这下完了 老大

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Rico, batteries!
translation.zh: 瑞哥 去找电池

translation.en: Skipper! Kowalski! Hold off those octopi!
translation.zh: 老大 科斯基 拖住那些丑八怪

translation.en: We're doing this now!
translation.zh: 我们一定要…成功！

translation.en: You heard Private! Deploy!
translation.zh: 你没听到吗？快去

translation.en: ♪ ♪ (raspy panting)
translation.zh: （电池 芝士条）

translation.en: Get back, you aquatic savages!
translation.zh: 滚回去吧 水里的丑八怪

translation.en: PRIVATE: Behind you! Beside you! Six o'clock! Twelve o'clock!
translation.zh: 后面 旁边 6点方向 12点方向

translation.en: PRIVATE: They're coming from every direction!
translation.zh: 哪个方向都有

translation.en: There's just too many of them!
translation.zh: 数量实在是太多了

translation.en: You came back!
translation.zh: 你们回来了

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Oh... that's why you look back at the explosion.
translation.zh: 难怪你要回头看爆炸呢

translation.en: (grunting) Fallback positions!
translation.zh: 组成撤退阵型

translation.en: Stay away from Private!
translation.zh: 离菜鸟远点儿

translation.en: Suck it up, Kowalski. Whoa, whoa.
translation.zh: 请上车吧 科斯基

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: It's over, Skipper.
translation.zh: 都结束了 老大

translation.en: Over? That's weird.
translation.zh: 结束 真奇怪

translation.en: Then why is Rico throwing me a fresh pair of double-A's?
translation.zh: 那瑞哥为什么还扔给我两节新电池呢

translation.en: No! The remote!
translation.zh: 不 遥控器

translation.en: Rico! Dibble me!
translation.zh: 瑞哥 芝士条

translation.en: It worked! (gasps) Private!
translation.zh: 成功了 菜鸟

translation.en: SKIPPER: Excuse me. Emergency. (Rico growls) Coming through. KOWALSKI: Sorry about the foot.
translation.zh: -抱歉 紧急情况 闪开 -不好意思

translation.en: Make a hole! Make a hole!
translation.zh: -抱歉 紧急情况 闪开 -不好意思 快闪开

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Don't worry, uh... a-a chrysalis
translation.zh: 不 不用担心 你的周围正在形成一层茧

translation.en: is just forming around you.
translation.zh: 不用担心 你的周围正在形成一层茧

translation.en: That's perfectly normal.
translation.zh: 这是很正常的

translation.en: Private. (Rico whimpering)
translation.zh: 菜鸟

translation.en: Huh? Huh? Wha...? Huh?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: Private?
translation.zh: 菜鸟？

translation.en: Oh! Look at that! Majestic.
translation.zh: 快看啊 真气派

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: (laughing) Private!
translation.zh: 菜鸟！

translation.en: Oh! Hey! (grunts) What's wrong? What are you... Look out for the...
translation.zh: -怎么了 你们这… -当心

translation.en: Whoa, now. Have I got something...
translation.zh: 有什么不对吗？ 小心 当心眼睛

translation.en: Okay, looking up. Cover your eyes. Is there a... thing? Don't turn your head.
translation.zh: -有什么东西？ -没有 别转了

translation.en: So... (light chuckle) how do I look?
translation.zh: 那么 我现在什么样？

translation.en: You're hideously disfigured
translation.zh: 你现在非常滑稽可笑

translation.en: and will probably be hunted for sport.
translation.zh: 很有可能会被追打取乐

translation.en: Wh-Wha...? What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -怎么了？

translation.en: If there's anything we've learned
translation.zh: 如果说这次愉快的历险

translation.en: from this delightful adventure-- Kowalski--
translation.zh: 教会了我们一些事情 科斯基 那就是外表根本不重要

translation.en: it's that looks don't matter.
translation.zh: 科斯基 那就是外表根本不重要

translation.en: It's what you do that counts.
translation.zh: 真正重要的…

translation.en: And look at what you did.
translation.zh: 是看你做了什么

translation.en: Yes, sir...
translation.zh: 事实证明 你是我们这个队伍中

translation.en: you are the most meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.zh: 事实证明 你是我们这个队伍中 最不可缺少的重要成员

translation.en: Way to go, Private! Attaboy!
translation.zh: 干得好 菜鸟 好小子！

translation.en: Nicely done.
translation.zh: 真棒！

translation.en: You did it! We're so proud of you!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 菜鸟！ 我们真为你骄傲

translation.en: You saved us! We love you, Private!
translation.zh: 你救了我们！ 我们爱你 菜鸟！

translation.en: Yeah, we love you! You the penguin!
translation.zh: -对 我们爱你！ -你是最棒的！

translation.en: Ramirez! Dave. Dave!
translation.zh: -拉米雷兹 戴夫 -是戴夫

translation.en: What? Are you kidding me?!
translation.zh: 什么？你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: (Dave groans) Dave. Oh-ho, look at you.
translation.zh: 戴夫 瞧瞧你啊

translation.en: You think this is over?
translation.zh: 你以为就这样结束了吗？

translation.en: I'm just getting started. I'm about to...
translation.zh: 你以为就这样结束了吗？ 这只是个开始

translation.en: What do we do with him now?
translation.zh: 该怎么处理他？

translation.en: GIRL: Aw...
translation.zh: 我还有比这厉害一倍的

translation.en: DAVE: Open this right now!
translation.zh: 现在立刻打开这个

translation.en: Here you go, kid.
translation.zh: 送给你了 孩子

translation.en: (distorted): Cool!
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: I hope you find happiness, Dave.
translation.zh: 我希望你能找到幸福 戴夫

translation.en: It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing! (Dave grunting frantically) It's snowing! It's snowing...
translation.zh: 下雪了

translation.en: Right, now, then...
translation.zh: 下雪了 好了 现在 这对我来说很难开口

translation.en: uh, um, this is difficult for me to say.
translation.zh: 好了 现在 这对我来说很难开口

translation.en: Is it "osteoporosis"?
translation.zh: 你是说想养只狗吗？

translation.en: You just got to lean into the vowel. Os-teo...
translation.zh: 说话时口腔要打开 “要养只狗”

translation.en: poro... No! No. I want to say...
translation.zh: 不 我是想说

translation.en: you four are the bravest agents I've ever known.
translation.zh: 你们四个是我认识的最勇敢的探员

translation.en: The point is...
translation.zh: 之前是我错看了你们

translation.en: I was wrong about you, and I hope...
translation.zh: 之前是我错看了你们 现在我希望能有办法可以弥补

translation.en: there's some way I can make it right.
translation.zh: 现在我希望能有办法可以弥补

translation.en: Give us jet packs. We should kiss.
translation.zh: 给个喷气背包吧 应该亲亲

translation.en: Did... did you just say...
translation.zh: 你刚才是说…

translation.en: Well, that feels right!
translation.zh: 这个感觉好极了

translation.en: I think I'd actually prefer a jet pack, please.
translation.zh: 我还是更想要喷气背包 谢谢了

translation.en: Ooh. I think we should go with Private's idea.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们是应该听菜鸟的

translation.en: Kowalski! What's our trajectory?
translation.zh: 科斯基 现在是什么情况？

translation.en: 95% certain this will end in massive...
translation.zh: 95%的几率着陆会非常惨烈

translation.en: flaming disaster!
translation.zh: 燃烧的灾难

translation.en: And the other five percent? Irrelevant, sir!
translation.zh: 那剩下的5%呢？ 忽略不计 长官

translation.en: Jet packs are awesome! SKIPPER: Agreed!
translation.zh: -喷气背包太棒了 -同意

translation.en: Who says penguins can't fly?
translation.zh: 谁说我们企鹅不会飞？

translation.en: PRIVATE: Um, Skipper, we are going to turn me back to normal, right?
translation.zh: 老大 你们会 让我恢复正常的 对吗？

translation.en: SKIPPER: Absolutely. First thing Monday.
translation.zh: 那当然 周一第一件事

translation.en: Whee! I'm in a rocket ship!
translation.zh: 我要坐火箭船了

translation.en: I want to push the button.
translation.zh: 我想按这个按钮

translation.en: Give me that! Hey! Stealer!
translation.zh: 快给我吧 强盗

translation.en: Let's do this! I'm ready!
translation.zh: 开始吧 我好了

translation.en: Okay, on three. One, three, go. Ow!
translation.zh: 好的 数三下 一、三 开始

translation.en: I'm just gonna do a little practice push. Aah!
translation.zh: 我只是想再练习一次按键 好了

translation.en: Okay, I'm not going to press it. Why are you
translation.zh: 我只是想再练习一次按键 好了 我不会按的 你干吗打我手？快看那边

translation.en: smacking my hand? Hey, look over there!
translation.zh: 你干吗打我手？快看那边

translation.en: (zapping) I'm a laser show.
translation.zh: 激光秀开始了

translation.en: Julien!
translation.zh: 朱利安

translation.en: Hey! Now, that's the Private we know and love. High one!
translation.zh: 这是我们最可爱的菜鸟 来一下

translation.en: Immeasurable cuteness,
translation.zh: 无法抵抗的可爱 就在这儿

translation.en: right there! Good to be back.
translation.zh: 无法抵抗的可爱 就在这儿 回来真好

translation.en: I feel like a French fry! Whoa! I'm okay!
translation.zh: 我感觉像根薯条 我没事

translation.en: And with cuteness to spare!
translation.zh: 可爱是要来分享的 来吧

translation.en: Come on! Frosty mugs of herring juice all around!
translation.zh: 可爱是要来分享的 来吧 大杯的冻爽鲱鱼汁人人有份 菜鸟请客

translation.en: SKIPPER: Private's buying. PRIVATE: What?
translation.zh: 大杯的冻爽鲱鱼汁人人有份 菜鸟请客

translation.en: You know, if I'm being honest,
translation.zh: 什么？如果让我实话实说

translation.en: I expected a little more... pizzazz!
translation.zh: 最好能再来点比萨

translation.en: (muffled laugh) Yes! Now, that's pizzazz! (giggles)
translation.zh: 没错 就是比萨
